TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi beforefieldinit WebPartManager extends System.Web.UI.Control implements class System.Web.UI.INamingContainer, class System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.IPersonalizable
Public Class WebPartManager Inherits Control Implements INamingContainer, IPersonalizable
public ref class WebPartManager : System::Web::UI::Control, System::Web::UI::INamingContainer, System::Web::UI::WebControls::WebParts::IPersonalizable
type WebPartManager = class inherit Control interface INamingContainer interface IPersonalizable

summary.span: Serves as the central class of the Web Parts control set, managing all the Web Parts controls, functionality, and events that occur on a Web page.

span.span: Serves as the central class of the Web Parts control set, managing all the Web Parts controls, functionality, and events that occur on a Web page.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 控制項可當做 Web 組件應用程式的集線器或控制中心。The control acts as the hub or control center of a Web Parts application. 必須要有一個，且只有一個-使用 Web 組件控制項的每個頁面上的控制項執行個體。There must be one--and only one-- control instance on every page that uses Web Parts controls. 如同 Web 組件的應用程式的大部分層面控制項只適用於已驗證的使用者。As with most aspects of Web Parts applications, the control works only with authenticated users. 此外，它的功能適用於幾乎完全位於繼承自的 Web 組件區域內的伺服器控制項類別。Further, its functionality works almost entirely with server controls that reside within Web Parts zones that inherit from the class. 這些區域之外的頁面上的伺服器控制項可以有極少的 Web 組件的功能或互動控制項。Server controls that reside on a page outside of these zones can have very little Web Parts functionality or interaction with the control. 為 Web 組件功能，在頁面上，中樞控制項執行下表中所述的工作種類。As the hub for Web Parts functionality on a page, the control carries out the kinds of tasks described in the following table. |工作分類Task category|控制項的功能What the control does| |-------------------|---------------------------| |追蹤 Web 組件控制項Tracking Web Parts controls|追蹤的許多不同種類的頁面上的控制項提供 Web 組件功能，包括控制項、 連線、 區域和其他項目。Keeps track of the many different kinds of controls on a page that provide Web Parts features, including controls, connections, zones, and others.| |新增和移除 Web 組件控制項Adding and removing Web Parts controls|提供方法來新增、 刪除和關閉網頁上的控制項。Provides the methods for adding, deleting, and closing controls on a page.| |管理連線Administering connections|建立控制項之間的連線，並且會監視連線，以及新增和移除它們的處理程序。Creates connections between controls, and monitors the connections as well as the processes of adding and removing them.| |個人化的控制項和網頁Personalizing controls and pages|可讓使用者在頁面上，移至不同位置的控制項，並啟動外觀、 屬性和控制項的行為，可以編輯使用者的檢視。Enables users to move controls to different locations on a page, and launches the views in which users can edit the appearance, properties, and behavior of controls. 會維護每個頁面上的特定使用者個人化設定。Maintains user-specific personalization settings on each page.| |不同的網頁檢視之間切換Toggling between different page views|之間切換不同的頁面上，特製化的檢視，讓使用者可以執行特定工作，例如變更頁面配置或編輯控制項。Switches a page among different specialized views of the page, so that users can carry out certain tasks such as changing page layout or editing controls.| |引發 Web 組件生命週期事件Raising Web Parts life-cycle events|定義、 引發，並可讓開發人員處理的 Web 組件控制項，例如當控制項正在加入、 移除、 已連線，或刪除的生命週期事件。Defines, raises, and enables developers to handle life-cycle events of Web Parts controls, such as when controls are being added, moved, connected, or deleted.| |啟用匯入和匯出的控制項Enabling import and export of controls|匯出包含的屬性狀態的 XML 資料流控制項，並可讓使用者匯入為了方便起見，在個人化複雜的控制項，在其他網頁或網站中的檔案。Exports XML streams that contain the state of the properties of controls, and allows users to import the files for convenience in personalizing complex controls in other pages or sites.| 類別有大量的屬性。The class has a large set of properties. 配合追蹤其他控制項的角色，它有一些參考的 Web 組件控制項或其他特殊的 Web 組件物件集合的屬性。Consistent with the role of tracking other controls, it has a number of properties that reference collections of either Web Parts controls, or other special Web Parts objects. ， ， ， ， ， ， ，並屬性所使用的所有集合其追蹤和其他控制項管理工作。The , , , , , , , and properties are all collections used by the control for its tracking and other management tasks. 屬性的另一個群組包含可自訂的 Web 組件應用程式中發生特定情況套用的警告。Another group of properties contains customizable warnings that apply in certain scenarios that occur in a Web Parts application. 其中包括，則，和屬性。These include the , the , and the properties. 類別會覆寫其基底的繼承屬性，許多 Web 伺服器控制項所使用的部分。The class overrides some of its base inherited properties, which are used by many Web server controls. 其中包括， ，和屬性。These include the , , and properties. 最後，還有一組屬性可用來存取應用程式的目前狀態。Finally, there is a group of properties useful for accessing the current state of the application. 屬性會指出目前的頁面是中的顯示模式。The property indicates the current display mode that a page is in. 屬性會指出是否允許控制項呈現用戶端指令碼，也就是相關的情況下，使用者可能有不同的功能的瀏覽器或的指令碼處理已關閉。The property indicates whether a control is allowed to render client-side script, which is relevant in situations where users might have browsers with different capabilities or have scripting turned off. 屬性可用於參考包含數個重要的 Web 組件方法所使用的擴充性的情況下呼叫的公用程式類別。The property is useful for referencing a utility class that contains the calls to a number of important Web Parts methods that are used for extensibility cases. 藉由隱藏個別的類別中的這些方法的呼叫 (類別)，則類別自己的 API 已經過簡化。By hiding the calls to these methods in a separate class (the class), the class's own API is simplified. 屬性可儲存使用者的個人化設定與該資料保存到永久儲存區的個人化物件的存取。The property provides access to the personalization objects that store users' personalization settings and persist that data to permanent storage. 屬性可指出哪些控制項在網頁上的目前選取的使用者或應用程式。The property indicates which control on a page is currently selected by the user or the application. 屬性會指出是否在上的自訂個人化資料控制項已變更。The property indicates whether custom personalization data on a control has changed. 控制項包含五個內建的顯示模式或網頁的檢視。The control contains five built-in display modes, or views of a Web page. 開發人員可以擴充此功能，例如擴充型別建立自訂的顯示模式類別或類別。Developers can extend this feature, creating custom display modes by extending types such as the class or the class. 使用者可以到各種不同的顯示模式中，切換頁面上，前提是適當對應至指定的顯示模式的控制項類型會出現在頁面上。Users can switch a page into the various display modes, provided that the proper kind of controls that correspond to a given display mode are present on a page. > [!NOTE] > 可以擴充此功能，讓使用者可以切換到自訂的顯示模式，而不需要對應的區域在頁面上。It is possible to extend this feature so that users can switch into a custom display mode without having a corresponding zone on the page. 不過，預設行為是顯示模式會對應至區域。However, the default behavior is that display modes correspond to zones. 在標準的顯示模式都由公用欄位類別。The standard display modes are represented by public fields in the class. 下表摘要說明的欄位，且它們參考的顯示模式。The following table summarizes the fields and the display modes they refer to. 目前的顯示模式的頁面上，如先前所述，固定會參考中屬性，並可在特定的頁面上，指定的區域出現在頁面上，類型的顯示模式集合包含在屬性。The current display mode of a page, as noted above, is always referenced in the property, and the set of display modes that is possible on a particular page, given the kind of zones that are present on the page, is contained in the property. |欄位Field|顯示模式的詳細資料Display mode details| |-----------|--------------------------| ||一般使用者的檢視網頁;預設值和最常見的顯示模式。The normal user view of a Web page; the default and most common display mode.| ||使用者可以重新排列或刪除控制項，以變更頁面配置 檢視。The view in which users can rearrange or delete controls to change the page layout.| ||變成可見的。 編輯的使用者介面 (UI) 的檢視使用者可以編輯的外觀、 屬性和行為，會顯示在一般的瀏覽模式的控制項。The view in which an editing user interface (UI) becomes visible; users can edit the appearance, properties, and behavior of the controls that are visible in the normal browse mode.| ||變成可見的; 目錄 UI 的檢視使用者可以從 類別目錄中可用的控制項，將控制項加入頁面。The view in which a catalog UI becomes visible; users can add controls to a page from catalogs of available controls.| ||變成可見的; 連接 UI 的檢視使用者可以連接、 管理或中斷控制項之間的連接。The view in which a connection UI becomes visible; users can connect, manage, or disconnect connections between controls.| 控制項也會包含在 Web 組件頁面和控制項的生命週期中不可或缺的事件數目。The control also contains a number of events that are critical in the life cycle of Web Parts pages and controls. 這些事件提供精確地以程式設計方式控制 Web 組件控制項的行為。These events provide precise programmatic control over the behavior of Web Parts controls. 大部分的方法與直接相關控制項 (或其他伺服器或使用者控制項置於區域，讓它們可以做控制項)。Most methods pertain directly to controls (or other server or user controls that are placed in zones so that they can behave as controls). 不過，少數事件有關的頁面或頁面上的連接狀態。However, a few events pertain to the state of the page or connections on the page. 下表列出可用的事件，並摘要說明其用途。The following table lists the available events and summarizes their purposes. > [!NOTE] > 在下表中的所有情況下，「 控制項 」 是指控制項或任何伺服器控制項位於區域中，會包裝與在執行階段的物件。In all cases in the following table, the word "control" refers to a control or any server control that resides in a zone and is wrapped with a object at run time. |Event - 事件Event|描述Description| |-----------|-----------------| ||控制項加入至頁面，以便確認它已獲授權之前發生。Occurs just before a control is added to a page to verify that it is authorized.| ||在頁面上的所有連線都已都啟動後發生。Occurs after all the connections on a page have been activated.| ||啟動頁面上的所有連接的程序之前發生。Occurs just before the process of activating all the connections on a page.| ||目前的顯示模式的頁面已變更之後，就會發生。Occurs after the current display mode of a page has changed.| ||變更頁面的顯示模式的程序之前發生。Occurs just before the process of changing a page's display mode.| ||已取消選取的控制項之後發生。Occurs after the selection of a control has been canceled.| ||取消選取的控制項的程序之前發生。Occurs just before the process of canceling the selection of a control.| ||將控制項新增至區域之後，就會發生。Occurs after a control has been added to a zone.| ||將控制項新增至區域的程序之前發生。Occurs just before the process of adding a control to a zone.| ||發生於控制項已關閉 （從頁面移除） 之後。Occurs after a control has been closed (removed from a page).| ||關閉控制項的程序之前發生。Occurs just before the process of closing a control.| ||動態控制項 （一個以程式設計方式建立或新增從類別目錄） 的執行個體已永久刪除之後，就會發生。Occurs after an instance of a dynamic control (one that was created programmatically or added from a catalog) has been permanently deleted.| ||刪除動態控制項的程序之前發生。Occurs just before the process of deleting a dynamic control.| ||控制項已移動在其區域或另一個區域之後，就會發生。Occurs after a control has moved within its zone or to another zone.| ||移動控制項的程序之前發生。Occurs just before the process of moving a control.| ||選取要參與連線的兩個控制項都已建立連接之後，就會發生。Occurs after two controls selected for participation in a connection have established the connection.| ||連接兩個控制項的程序之前發生。Occurs just before the process of connecting two controls.| ||連線已經中斷連接的兩個控制項之後發生。Occurs after two connected controls have been disconnected.| ||中斷連線的兩個控制項的程序之前發生。Occurs just before the process of disconnecting two controls.| 控制項有許多方法來管理網頁組件頁面。The control has numerous methods for managing Web Parts pages. 大量的方法，未列在這裡，是其名稱會採用的方法*EventName*。A large set of the methods, not listed here, are methods whose names take the form of On*EventName*. 這些方法通常引發其相關聯的事件，並提供事件類型的處理常式。These methods typically raise their associated event, and provide the event with a handler of type . 繼承自開發人員可以覆寫這些方法大多類別。Most of these methods can be overridden by developers who inherit from the class. 此外，網頁程式開發人員可以使用這些方法相關聯的事件提供自訂處理常式。Also, page developers can provide custom handlers for the events associated with these methods. 比方說，如果是事件，為網頁開發人員可以加入`OnWebPartAdded`屬性設定為``的標記網頁，然後將指派的自訂方法名稱屬性，以提供自訂事件的處理中的項目。For example, in the case of the event, a page developer could add an `OnWebPartAdded` attribute to the `` element in the markup of a Web page, and then assign a custom method name to the attribute to provide custom handling for the event. 屬性會對應方法和事件處理適用於大部分的 Web 組件事件和其相關聯的方法的這個基本模式。The attribute corresponds to the method, and this basic pattern of event handling works for most Web Parts events and their associated methods. 颾魤 ㄛ控制項都有特定的管理工作的方法控制項 (與伺服器或使用者控制項作為控制項)。In addition, the control has methods particular to the task of managing controls (and server or user controls used as controls). 這些方法包括， ， ， ， ， ， ， ， ， ， ， ， ，和。These methods include , , , , , , , , , , , , , and . 另一組方法，被專門用來連線。Another set of methods is specialized for connections. 這包括方法，例如， ， ， ， ， ， ， ， ，以及。This includes methods such as , , , , , , , , , and . 最後，某些方法著重於個人化功能。Finally, some methods focus on personalization functionality. 其中包括， ， ， ， ， ，和。These include , , , , , , and . 如需其他詳細資訊方法，可透過存取屬性，請參閱文件類別。For more information on other methods that are accessible through the property, see the documentation for the class. ## Examples 下列程式碼範例示範宣告式和以程式設計方式使用控制項。The following code example demonstrates both declarative and programmatic use of the control. 在程式碼範例包含四個部分：The code example has four parts: - 使用者控制項，可讓您變更 Web 組件頁面上的顯示模式。A user control that enables you to change display modes on a Web Parts page. - 包含兩個自訂的網頁可以連接的控制項和``項目。A Web page that contains two custom controls that can be connected, and an `` element. - 原始程式碼檔，其中包含兩個自訂控制項和自訂的介面。A source code file that contains two custom controls, and a custom interface. - 此範例在瀏覽器中的運作方式的說明。An explanation of how the example works in a browser. 使用者控制項有下拉式清單控制項在頁面上，指定 Web 組件控制項出現在頁面上顯示可能的顯示模式。The user control has a drop-down list control that shows the possible display modes on a page, given the Web Parts controls that are present on the page. 在網頁上，此程式碼範例中，這個使用者控制項宣告的正下方網頁的標記中的項目，而且沒有`Register`指示詞來註冊控制項的網頁頂端附近。In the Web page for this code example, this user control is declared just below the element in the page's markup, and there is a `Register` directive near the top of the Web page to register the control. For 詳細資料會顯示在此控制項模式和原始碼的描述，請參閱[逐步解說： 變更 Web 組件頁面上顯示的模式](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/24e42f74-82dc-4c13-8574-130398985fc0)。For details about display modes and a description of the source code in this control, see [Walkthrough: Changing Display Modes on a Web Parts Page](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/24e42f74-82dc-4c13-8574-130398985fc0). [!code-aspx-csharp[WebParts_WebPartManager_SimpleConnection#6](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/WebParts_WebPartManager_SimpleConnection/CS/displaymodemenucs.ascx#6)] [!code-aspx-vb[WebParts_WebPartManager_SimpleConnection#6](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/WebParts_WebPartManager_SimpleConnection/VB/DisplayModeMenuVB.ascx#6)] Web 網頁的宣告式標記包含`Register`使用者控制項和自訂控制項的指示詞。The declarative markup for the Web page contains `Register` directives for both the user control and the custom controls. 沒有``項目，``項目以包含自訂控制項，並有``項目。There is an `` element, an `` element to contain the custom controls, and an `` element. 這個頁面也包含一些內嵌程式碼，處理連接相關的事件控制; 您可以看到這段程式碼的效果，當您連接和中斷連接控制項。The page also contains some inline code that handles connection-related events for the control; you can see the effect of this code as you connect and disconnect controls. [!code-aspx-csharp[WebParts_WebPartManager_SimpleConnection#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/WebParts_WebPartManager_SimpleConnection/CS/webpartmanagerConnectionCS.aspx#1)] [!code-aspx-vb[WebParts_WebPartManager_SimpleConnection#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/WebParts_WebPartManager_SimpleConnection/VB/webpartmanagerConnectionVB.aspx#1)] 此範例的第三個部分是控制項的原始程式碼。The third part of the example is the source code for the controls. 請注意，沒有名為的介面`IZipCode`，並在實作這個介面`ZipCodeWebPart`類別。Note that there is an interface named `IZipCode`, and this interface is implemented in the `ZipCodeWebPart` class. 這個類別具有一個名為的特殊回呼方法`ProvideIZipCode`做為提供者。This class has a special callback method named `ProvideIZipCode` that serves as a provider. 其他類型，名為`WeatherWebPart`，也利用特殊的方法，名為實作`GetIZipCode`，使得控制項做為其他控制項的取用者。The other type, named `WeatherWebPart`, is also implemented with a special method named `GetIZipCode`, which enables the control to act as a consumer of the other control. 若要執行程式碼範例，您必須編譯這個原始程式碼。For the code example to run, you must compile this source code. 您可以明確編譯它，然後將產生的組件放在您的網站的 Bin 資料夾或全域組件快取。You can compile it explicitly and put the resulting assembly in your Web site's Bin folder or the global assembly cache. 或者，您可以將原始程式碼放在您網站的 App_Code 資料夾中，這樣就會在執行階段進行動態編譯。Alternatively, you can put the source code in your site's App_Code folder, where it will be dynamically compiled at run time. 此程式碼範例假設您有組件中，編譯的來源和`Register`網頁中的指示詞參考的組件名稱。This code example assumes that you have compiled the source into an assembly, and the `Register` directive in the Web page references the assembly name. 如需示範如何編譯的逐步解說，請參閱 < [ 逐步解說： 開發和使用自訂 Web 伺服器控制項](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/6d90782a-a1a4-45a6-b2d4-cf6362b83b08)。For a walkthrough that demonstrates how to compile, see [Walkthrough: Developing and Using a Custom Web Server Control](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/6d90782a-a1a4-45a6-b2d4-cf6362b83b08). [!code-csharp[WebParts_WebPartManager_SimpleConnection#2](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/WebParts_WebPartManager_SimpleConnection/CS/ZipCodeComponent.cs#2)] [!code-vb[WebParts_WebPartManager_SimpleConnection#2](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/WebParts_WebPartManager_SimpleConnection/VB/ZipCodeComponent.vb#2)] 您已載入網頁瀏覽器中之後，請按一下**顯示模式**下拉式清單控制項，然後選取**Connect**切換頁面，即可連接模式。After you have loaded the Web page in a browser, click the **Display Mode** drop-down list control and select **Connect** to switch the page to connect mode. 連接模式使用``項目，可讓您建立控制項之間的連線。Connect mode uses the `` element to enable you to create connections between controls. 在連線模式中，按一下標題列中的向下箭號**郵遞區號**控制項來啟用它的動詞命令功能表中，然後按一下**Connect**。In connect mode, click the downward arrow in the title bar of the **ZIP Code** control to activate its verbs menu, and then click **Connect**. 連接 UI 出現後，按一下**建立取用者的連接**連結。After the connection UI appears, click the **Create a connection to a Consumer** link. 資料格會顯示具有下拉式清單控制項。A cell appears that has a drop-down list control. 選取 **天氣控制項**中的下拉式清單中，然後按一下**Connect**完成兩個控制項的連線。Select **Weather Control** in the drop-down list, and then click **Connect** to complete the connection of the two controls. 按一下 **關閉**，然後使用**顯示模式**頁面返回標準瀏覽模式的下拉式清單。Click **Close**, and then use the **Display Mode** drop-down list to return the page to normal browse mode. 您可以輸入郵遞區號，和消費者控制項將會更新與您所輸入的值。You can enter a ZIP Code, and the consumer control will be updated with the value you enter. 因為`ZipCode`屬性標記為`Personalizable`在原始程式碼中，這個屬性值的屬性將瀏覽器工作階段之間保存，因此儲存由使用者所輸入的值。Because the `ZipCode` property was marked with the `Personalizable` attribute in the source code, this property value will persist across browser sessions, thus saving the value entered by a user. 更複雜的消費者控制項無法接受郵遞區號資訊、 天氣資訊根據程式碼中，查詢和顯示給使用者。A more sophisticated consumer control could take the ZIP code information, look up weather information based on the code, and display it to a user.

span.para: 控制項的設計是要擴充。因為它是 Web 組件應用程式，當您想要擴充某種特定類型或控制 Web 組件控制集，在許多情況下的中心必須也延伸讓類別，因為很可能會有一些屬性或方法，才能讓 您的自訂類型的 Web 組件應用程式的內容中運作。Web 組件參考文件 (請參閱)，討論如何擴充 Web 組件輸入時，經常提及哪些項目要進行擴充類別，或示範如何擴充在程式碼範例。

The control is designed to be extended. Because it is so central to Web Parts applications, when you want to extend some specific type or control in the Web Parts control set, in many cases you must also extend the class, because it is likely to have some property or method that is required to make your custom type work in the context of a Web Parts application. The Web Parts reference documentation (see ), when discussing how to extend a Web Parts type, frequently mentions what needs to be done to extend the class as well, or shows how to extend it in a code example.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 建構函式會初始化所使用的數個重要變數控制項。The constructor initializes several important variables used by the control. 會直接影響所有的網頁組件頁面的第一個指派為預設頁面顯示模式設定為瀏覽模式的事實 ()。One assignment that directly impacts all Web Parts pages is the fact that the default page display mode is set to browse mode ().

summary.span: Makes active all connections on a Web page that are currently inactive.

span.span: Makes active all connections on a Web page that are currently inactive.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 至頁面每個要求，啟動之間的現有連接上呼叫方法和位於其他伺服器控制項區域。The method is called on each request to a page to activate existing connections between and other server controls residing in zones. 在某些情況下，執行個體，如果沒有衝突的連接中啟用，這個方法又呼叫方法以結束有問題的連線。In some cases, for instance if there is a conflict in the connections being activated, this method in turn calls the method to end the problematic connection. 在中斷連線程序期間就會引發事件。During the disconnection process the event is raised. 通常開發人員可以取消這個事件，但在情況下，這是衝突的連接，便無法予以取消，因為控制項需要解決的衝突，才能完成啟用連線處理程序。Normally developers can cancel this event, but in the case where this is a conflict among the connections it cannot be cancelled, because the control needs to resolve the conflict in order to finish the process of activating connections. 如需詳細資訊，請參閱事件。For details, see event.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 方法可同時加入新的動態控制頁面上，並重新開啟先前已關閉網頁的靜態或動態控制項。The method is used both to add new dynamic controls to a page, and to reopen static or dynamic controls that have previously been closed on a page. 呼叫方法時，若要加入新的控制項，它實際上會建立一份中參考的控制項`webPart`參數。When the method is called to add a new control, it actually creates a copy of the control referenced in the `webPart` parameter. 複本的控制項，會產生新的識別碼，因此開發人員應該參考控制傳回的方法，以取得新的識別碼值。A new ID is generated for the copy of the control, so developers should reference the control returned from the method to get the new ID value. 若要重新開啟先前已關閉的控制項呼叫方法時，它會傳回所參考的控制項的直接參考`webPart`參數。When the method is called to reopen a previously closed control, it returns a direct reference to the control referenced by the `webPart` parameter. > [!IMPORTANT] > 您應該一律使用方法，而非方法所參考的控制項集合屬性，以新增到頁面上，以程式設計方式控制，因為使用方法會擲回例外狀況。You should always use the method, rather than the method of the collection of controls referenced by the property, to add controls programmatically to the page, because using the method throws an exception. 若要將控制項不是控制項 (換句話說，就會將它換行，與伺服器控制項控制項在執行階段)，您應該先呼叫方法來建立控制項，並接著呼叫方法來加入控制項。To add a control that is not a control (in other words, a server control that will be wrapped with a control at run time), you should first call the method to create the control, and then call the method to add the control. 如需示範這種方法，請參閱 < 範例 > 一節。For a demonstration of this approach, see the Example section. ## Examples 下列程式碼範例示範使用要以程式設計方式新增至網頁的伺服器控制項的方法。The following code example demonstrates use of the method to add a server control programmatically to a page. 在網頁標記包含空``項目，和``項目。The page markup contains an empty `` element, and an `` element. 第一次**加入行事曆**按一下按鈕時，程式碼在事件處理常式會建立控制項，並將它新增至區域物件，呼叫方法。The first time the **Add Calendar** button is clicked, the code in the event handler creates a control, and adds it to a zone as a object, calling the method. [!code-aspx-csharp[WebParts_WebPartManager_DeleteWebPart#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/WebParts_WebPartManager_DeleteWebPart/CS/wpmgDeleteWebPartCS.aspx#1)] [!code-aspx-vb[WebParts_WebPartManager_DeleteWebPart#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/WebParts_WebPartManager_DeleteWebPart/VB/wpmgDeleteWebPartVB.aspx#1)]

MemberSignature.Value: Public Custom Event AuthorizeWebPart As WebPartAuthorizationEventHandler

summary.span: Occurs when the method is called to determine whether a or server control can be added to a page.

span.span: Occurs when the method is called to determine whether a or server control can be added to a page.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 事件就會發生控制項正在加入至頁面。The event occurs whenever a control is being added to a page. 有幾個常見的案例，其中加入控制項至頁面。There are a number of common scenarios where a control can be added to a page. 這些完整說明，請參閱 < 備註 > 一節方法。For a full description of these, see the Remarks section for the method. 當控制項加入時，必須檢查以查看是否其已經設定屬性，而且如果是的話，是否控制項獲得授權可加入至頁面。When a control is added, it must be checked to see whether its property has been set and, if so, whether the control is authorized to be added to the page. 開發人員可以建立事件處理常式事件，來提供篩選控制項。Developers can create event handlers for the event, to provide filtering for controls. 如果控制項的屬性值不符合事件處理常式程式碼中的條件，控制項不會加入至頁面。If a control's property value does not meet the criteria in the event handler code, the control is not added to the page. ## Examples 下列程式碼範例示範如何設定的自訂事件處理常式事件，會自動覆寫預設方法。The following code example demonstrates how to set a custom event handler for the event, which automatically overrides the default method. 中的程式碼`mgr1_AuthorizeWebPart`方法會檢查頁面上的控制項是否有其各自屬性值設定為`user`而且，如果是的話，會傳回`true`，這表示將會獲得授權並新增至頁面。The code in the `mgr1_AuthorizeWebPart` method checks whether the controls on the page have their respective property values set to `user` and, if so, returns `true`, which means that they will be authorized and added to the page. 這是假設的預設方法是允許使用者檢視與頁面的控制項在使用者的個人化範圍。This assumes the default approach is to allow users to view controls with a page in user personalization scope. 請注意，不過，在控制項的其中一個範例中具有其屬性值設定為`admin`。Notice, however, that in the example one of the controls has its property value set to `admin`. 開發人員可能會專為系統管理使用者只查看的特製化控制項上放置此篩選器。Developers might place this filter on a specialized control that was designed for only administrative users to see. 這個控制項將會失敗期間的授權檢查事件，並不會顯示。This control will fail the authorization check during the event, and will not be displayed. 請注意並沒有設定之屬性的控制項; 也會顯示它們會假設不是篩選案例的一部分，因為其沒有設定的屬性。Note that controls that do not have the property set are displayed as well; they are assumed not to be part of a filtering scenario because their properties are not set. [!code-aspx-csharp[WebParts_WebPartManager_AuthorizeWebPart#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/WebParts_WebPartManager_AuthorizeWebPart/CS/AuthorizeWebPartCS.aspx#1)] [!code-aspx-vb[WebParts_WebPartManager_AuthorizeWebPart#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/WebParts_WebPartManager_AuthorizeWebPart/VB/AuthorizeWebPartVB.aspx#1)]

remarks.format: ## Remarks 方法是否存在，以便建立控制項之間連接的程序可在不同的階段，讓開發人員更充分掌控連線程序。The method exists so that the process of forming connections between controls can be done in distinct stages, giving developers more control over the connection process. 此方法會執行一組初始的檢查，以確保`webPart`處於的其中一個連線可以合法組成。The method performs a set of initial checks to ensure that `webPart` is in a state where a connection can legitimately be formed. 如果`webPart`通過所有檢查時，它接著會設定為目前選取的控制項 (請參閱屬性)，而且連接的程序可以繼續。If `webPart` passes all the checks, it is then set as the currently selected control (see the property), and the connecting process can continue.

span.para: 開發人員需要擴充控制項可能會想要覆寫這個方法在衍生類別中的。其中一個方法是呼叫基底方法，然後再加入其他自訂處理;或者，您可能想要完全自訂啟動控制項之間連接的程序。比方說，您可以確認特定的資料可供使用，然後再建立連線。

Developers who need to extend the control might want to override this method in a derived class. One approach would be to call the base method, and then add some additional custom handling; or you might want to completely customize the process of starting a connection between controls. For example, you might want to verify that certain data is available before creating the connection.

span.span: This field is read-only.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 欄位會參考自訂建立和所包含的物件控制項。The field references a custom object that is created and contained by the control. 因為這是靜態物件，您可以參考它直接透過類別，而不需要控制項的執行個體。Because this is a static object, you can refer to it directly through the class without needing an instance of the control. 包含 Web 組件的頁面控制項第一次載入時，在（瀏覽模式） 的預設值。When a page that contains Web Parts controls first loads, it is in (browse mode) by default. 如同一般的網頁上，使用者只要瀏覽，頁面仍保留在瀏覽模式。When users are simply browsing as they would on a normal Web page, the page remains in browse mode. 如果使用者想要個人化頁面的版面配置、 控制項、 外觀或行為，他們必須將網頁切換成其中一個特製化的顯示模式可透過屬性。If users want to personalize a page's layout, controls, appearance, or behavior, they must switch the page into one of the specialized display modes available through the property. ## Examples 下列程式碼範例示範如何使用欄位以程式設計的方式。The following code example demonstrates how to work with the field programmatically. 支援的顯示模式，在此情況下為 瀏覽和設計下拉式清單中填入程式碼。The code populates a drop-down list with the supported display modes, which in this case are browse and design. 請注意，在`Page_PreRender`方法中，程式碼會檢查是否目前屬性設定為。Notice that, in the `Page_PreRender` method, the code checks whether the current property is set to . 如果是的話`Label1`會顯示，如果沒有的話，`Label1`會隱藏。If so, `Label1` will be visible, and if not, `Label1` will be hidden. [!code-aspx-csharp[WebParts_WebPartManager_BrowseDisplayMode#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/WebParts_WebPartManager_BrowseDisplayMode/CS/wpmgrBrowseDisplayModecs.aspx#1)] [!code-aspx-vb[WebParts_WebPartManager_BrowseDisplayMode#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/WebParts_WebPartManager_BrowseDisplayMode/VB/wpmgrBrowseDisplayModevb.aspx#1)] 在瀏覽器頁面載入之後，您就預設的瀏覽模式。After you load the page in a browser, you are in browse mode by default. 請注意，指出您的瀏覽模式在頁面上的標籤。Notice the label on the page that indicates you are in browse mode. 使用下拉式清單控制項，將頁面切換到設計模式。Use the drop-down list control to switch the page to design mode. 請注意，因為中的程式碼`Page_PreRender`方法中，標籤現在會隱藏起來。Notice that, because of the code in the `Page_PreRender` method, the label is now hidden.

summary.span: Checks the controls that will be participating in a connection to determine whether they are capable of being connected.

span.span: Checks the controls that will be participating in a connection to determine whether they are capable of being connected.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 方法用來判斷兩個控制項可以連接。The method is used to determine whether two controls can be connected. 方法通常用做為條件式的檢查，才能呼叫方法。The method is typically used as a conditional check prior to calling the method. 方法會檢查幾個兩個控制項可以形成連線之前必須符合的條件。The method checks a number of criteria that must be met before two controls can form a connection. 下列清單摘要說明主要的準則進行連接。The following list summarizes the primary criteria for making a connection. 如果已符合所有這些準則 （加上一些額外的內部狀況），則方法會傳回`true`，表示控制項可以連接：If all these criteria (plus some additional internal conditions) are met, the method returns `true`, meaning that the controls can be connected: - 提供者和消費者控制項不能`null`，它們必須包含在所參考的控制項的集合和屬性。The provider and consumer controls cannot be `null`, and they must be contained in the collection of controls referenced by the property. - 提供者和取用者不能在同一個控制項。The provider and consumer cannot be the same control. 亦即控制項無法連線到本身。In other words a control cannot connect to itself. - 提供者和取用者的物件 （連接點） 不能是`null`。The objects (connection points) for both the provider and consumer cannot be `null`. - 無法關閉提供者和取用者 (沒有控制項屬性可以是`true`)。The provider and consumer cannot be closed (neither control's property can be `true`). - 連接點控制項的屬性必須比對的消費者和提供者的控制項型別。The property of the connection point control must match the type of the control of both consumer and provider. - 連接點皆必須啟用 (及其方法必須都傳回`true`)。The connection points must both be enabled (their methods must both return `true`). - 每一個連接點必須未嘗試形成更多的連線，在它自己所指定者屬性。Each connection point must not be attempting to form more connections than what is specified in its own property. - 如果物件 (transformer)，才能連接不相容的控制項，它不能為`null`。If a object (transformer) is required to connect incompatible controls, it cannot be `null`. 不過，如果控制項已經相容，必須是 transformer `null`。However, if the controls are already compatible, the transformer must be `null`. - 轉換器 （如果使用） 必須在中參考集合。The transformer (if used) must be referenced in the collection. - 轉換器 （如果使用） 必須是相容的提供者和取用者，以便它可以將兩個控制項之間的資料轉換的介面。The transformer (if used) must have interfaces that are compatible with the provider and the consumer so that it can transform data between the two controls. 次要介面的消費者和提供者也必須相容。The secondary interfaces of the consumer and provider must also be compatible.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 這個方法用來連接`provider`並`consumer`當兩個控制項有相容的連接點型別，以便不需要物件。This method is used to connect `provider` and `consumer` when both controls have compatible connection point types, so that a object is not needed. 您可能想要使用這個方法來確認兩個控制項都可以連接然後再呼叫建立的程式設計連線。You might want to use this method to verify that two controls can be connected before calling to create a programmatic connection. 這個多載會使用相同的實作，做為方法多載，在這個多載不需要轉換程式唯一的例外狀況。This overload uses the same implementation as the method overload, with the only exception being that this overload does not require a transformer. ## Examples 下列程式碼範例示範如何使用這個方法。The following code example demonstrates how to use this method. 在程式碼範例包含四個部分：The code example has four parts: - 使用者控制項，可讓您變更 Web 組件頁面上的顯示模式。A user control that enables you to change display modes on a Web Parts page. - 包含兩個自訂的網頁可以連接的控制項``項目，並建立連線，使用一些事件處理程式碼方法。A Web page that contains two custom controls that can be connected, an `` element, and some event-handling code that creates a connection using the method. - 原始程式碼檔，其中包含兩個自訂控制項和自訂的介面。A source code file that contains two custom controls, and a custom interface. - 此範例在瀏覽器中的運作方式的說明。An explanation of how the example works in a browser. 在程式碼範例的第一個部分是變更顯示模式的使用者控制項。The first part of the code example is the user control for changing display modes. 您可以取得使用者控制項的原始程式碼範例區段的類別概觀。You can obtain the source code for the user control from the Example section of the class overview. 如需有關顯示模式，以及使用者控制的運作方式的詳細資訊，請參閱 < [ 逐步解說： 變更 Web 組件頁面上顯示的模式](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/24e42f74-82dc-4c13-8574-130398985fc0)。For more information about display modes and how the user control works, see [Walkthrough: Changing Display Modes on a Web Parts Page](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/24e42f74-82dc-4c13-8574-130398985fc0). Web 網頁的宣告式標記包含`Register`使用者控制項和自訂控制項的指示詞。The declarative markup for the Web page contains `Register` directives for both the user control and the custom controls. 沒有``項目，``項目以包含自訂控制項，並有``項目。There is an `` element, an `` element to contain the custom controls, and an `` element. 請注意，在`Page_Load`方法中，程式碼會檢查是否連線可和，若是如此，定義提供者、 取用者，以及其各自的連接點，然後將新的連線新增至所參考的靜態連接集合的屬性。Notice that in the `Page_Load` method, the code checks whether the connection can be made and, if so, defines a provider, a consumer, and their respective connection points, and then adds a new connection to the set of static connections referenced by the property. [!code-aspx-csharp[WebParts_WebPartManager_StaticConnections#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/WebParts_WebPartManager_StaticConnections/CS/wpmgrStaticConnectionCS.aspx#1)] [!code-aspx-vb[WebParts_WebPartManager_StaticConnections#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/WebParts_WebPartManager_StaticConnections/VB/wpmgrStaticConnectionVB.aspx#1)] 此範例的第三個部分是控制項的原始程式碼。The third part of the example is the source code for the controls. 它包含介面和兩個自訂控制項，做為提供者和取用者為另一個。It contains an interface and two custom controls, one acting as a provider, and the other as a consumer. 因為它們有相容的連接點 (它們兩者皆認定`IZipCode`介面)，轉換程式不需要進行連接。Because they have compatible connection points (both of them recognize the `IZipCode` interface), a transformer is not needed to make the connection. 若要執行程式碼範例，您必須編譯這個原始程式碼。For the code example to run, you must compile this source code. 您可以明確編譯它，然後將產生的組件放在您的網站的 Bin 資料夾或全域組件快取。You can compile it explicitly and put the resulting assembly in your Web site's Bin folder or the global assembly cache. 或者，您可以將原始程式碼放在您網站的 App_Code 資料夾中，這樣就會在執行階段進行動態編譯。Alternatively, you can put the source code in your site's App_Code folder, where it will be dynamically compiled at run time. 如需示範如何編譯的逐步解說，請參閱 < [ 逐步解說： 開發和使用自訂 Web 伺服器控制項](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/6d90782a-a1a4-45a6-b2d4-cf6362b83b08)。For a walkthrough that demonstrates how to compile, see [Walkthrough: Developing and Using a Custom Web Server Control](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/6d90782a-a1a4-45a6-b2d4-cf6362b83b08). [!code-csharp[WebParts_WebPartManager_StaticConnections#2](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/WebParts_WebPartManager_StaticConnections/CS/ZipCodeComponent.cs#2)] [!code-vb[WebParts_WebPartManager_StaticConnections#2](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/WebParts_WebPartManager_StaticConnections/VB/ZipCodeComponent.vb#2)] 您已載入網頁瀏覽器中之後，請按一下**顯示模式**下拉式清單控制項，然後選取**Connect**切換頁面，即可連接模式。After you have loaded the Web page in a browser, click the **Display Mode** drop-down list control and select **Connect** to switch the page to connect mode. 連接模式使用``項目，可讓您建立控制項之間的連線。Connect mode uses the `` element to enable you to create connections between controls. 在連線模式中，按一下標題列中的向下箭號**郵遞區號**控制項來啟用它的動詞命令功能表中，然後按一下**Connect**。In connect mode, click the downward arrow in the title bar of the **ZIP Code** control to activate its verbs menu, and then click **Connect**. 連接使用者介面 (UI) 會出現之後，請注意，連線已經存在的程式碼中包含`Page_Load`方法。After the connection user interface (UI) appears, notice that a connection has already been created by the code contained in the `Page_Load` method.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 這個方法用來連接`provider`並`consumer`當兩個控制項都有不相容連接點型別，以便需要物件時。This method is used to connect `provider` and `consumer` when both controls have incompatible connection point types, so that a object is required. 您可能想要使用這個方法來確認兩個控制項都可以連接然後再呼叫建立的程式設計連線。You might want to use this method to verify that two controls can be connected before calling to create a programmatic connection. 這個多載會使用相同的實作，做為方法多載，在這個多載都需要轉換程式唯一的例外狀況。This overload uses the same implementation as the method overload, with the only exception being that this overload requires a transformer.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 欄位會參考自訂建立和所包含的物件控制項。The field references a custom object that is created and contained by the control. 因為這是靜態物件，您可以參考它直接透過類別，而不需要控制項的執行個體。Because this is a static object, you can refer to it directly through the class without needing an instance of the control. 當使用者想要將控制項加入至頁面，如果可用的伺服器控制項的目錄時，它們可以切換至頁面（目錄模式），並出現類別目錄的使用者介面 (UI)。When users want to add controls to a page, if a catalog of server controls is available, they can switch the page to (catalog mode), and the catalog user interface (UI) appears. Web 組件類別目錄的 UI 由提供區域控制項。The UI for a Web Parts catalog is provided by a zone control. 開發人員加入網頁中的這個區域，在設計階段，並，讓使用者將能夠在執行階段將這些控制項加入其頁面，再將伺服器控制項新增到區域。Developers add this zone to the page at design time, and then add server controls to the zone, so that users will be able to add those controls to their pages at run time. 開發人員已加入這些控制項之後，目錄模式會成為頁面上的受支援的顯示模式，因為必要的控制項有啟用目錄的模式。After the developer has added these controls, catalog mode becomes a supported display mode on the page because the necessary controls are there to enable catalog mode. 當使用者切換目錄模式、 區域和就會變得可見，已加入的所有伺服器控制項的頁面，使用者可以選取控制項從類別目錄 頁面上，新增或移除從頁面的控制項。When a user switches a page to catalog mode, the zone and all the server controls that were added to it become visible, and the user can select controls from the catalog to add to the page, or remove controls from the page. 控制項都已加入至頁面之後，它們會出現在一般的瀏覽模式，並更新頁面。After the controls have been added to the page, they appear in normal browse mode and the page is updated. ## Examples 下列程式碼範例示範如何使用欄位以程式設計的方式。The following code example demonstrates how to work with the field programmatically. 程式碼會填入下拉式清單中的頁面上，在此情況下會瀏覽、 設計和類別目錄支援的顯示模式。The code populates a drop-down list with the supported display modes for the page, which in this case are browse, design, and catalog. 目錄模式可因``項目和其子項目在網頁中的。The catalog mode is available because of the `` element and its child elements in the Web page. 請注意，在`Page_PreRender`方法中，程式碼會檢查是否目前屬性設定為。Notice that, in the `Page_PreRender` method, the code checks whether the current property is set to . 如果是的話`Label1`會顯示，如果沒有的話，`Label1`會隱藏。If so, `Label1` will be visible, and if not, `Label1` will be hidden. [!code-aspx-csharp[WebParts_WebPartManager_CatalogDisplayMode#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/WebParts_WebPartManager_CatalogDisplayMode/CS/wpmgrCatalogDisplayModecs.aspx#1)] [!code-aspx-vb[WebParts_WebPartManager_CatalogDisplayMode#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/WebParts_WebPartManager_CatalogDisplayMode/VB/wpmgrCatalogDisplayModevb.aspx#1)] 在瀏覽器頁面載入之後，您就預設的瀏覽模式。After you load the page in a browser, you are in browse mode by default. 請注意頁面上的標籤會隱藏。Notice that the label on the page is hidden. 使用下拉式清單控制項，將頁面切換至目錄模式。Use the drop-down list control to switch the page to catalog mode. 請注意，因為中的程式碼`Page_PreRender`方法中，標籤現在會顯示。Notice that, because of the code in the `Page_PreRender` method, the label is now visible. 您可以在目錄中選取的控制項，並將它新增至其中一個頁面上的兩個區域。You can select the control in the catalog and add it to either of the two zones on the page.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 當使用者關閉控制項，通常會顯示任何訊息。When a user closes a control, normally no message is displayed. 如需有關如何關閉控制項的意義的詳細資訊，請參閱方法。For more information about what it means to close a control, see the method. 不過，當控制項已連線到另一個控制項，並做為資料提供者的其他控制項，預設的警告訊息會顯示，當使用者嘗試關閉控制項。However, when a control is connected to another control and is acting as a provider of data to the other control, a default warning message is displayed when a user attempts to close the control. 訊息會告知使用者，提供者控制項即將關閉，表示控制項連接到此提供者，取用者將不再有任何要取用的資料。The message tells users that a provider control is about to close, which means that controls connected to this provider as consumers will no longer have any data to consume. 屬性可讓開發人員可以自訂向使用者顯示警告訊息。The property enables developers to customize the warning message that is displayed to the user. 當使用者關閉時，如果頁面開發人員會指派給這個屬性空白或 null 字串值，會顯示任何警告訊息方塊是提供者的控制項。If a page developer assigns an empty or null string value to this property, no warning message box will be shown when a user closes a control that is a provider. ## Examples 下列程式碼範例示範如何使用屬性對使用者顯示自訂的警告。The following code example demonstrates how to use the property to display a custom warning to users. 在程式碼範例包含四個部分：The code example has four parts: - 使用者控制項，可讓您變更 Web 組件頁面上的顯示模式。A user control that enables you to change display modes on a Web Parts page. - 原始程式碼檔，其中包含兩個自訂控制項和自訂的介面。A source code file that contains two custom controls and a custom interface. - 包含兩個自訂的網頁可以連接的控制項和``項目。A Web page that contains two custom controls that can be connected and an `` element. - 此範例在瀏覽器中的運作方式的說明。An explanation of how the example works in a browser. 下列程式碼包含只有網頁的部分範例。The following code contains only the Web page portion of the example. 您也需要自訂使用者控制項和先前所述的自訂控制項的原始程式碼。You will also need the custom user control and the source code for the custom controls mentioned above. 從的範例 > 一節中取得這兩項類別概觀。Obtain these two items from the Example section of the class overview. 下列的網頁程式碼示範如何指派自訂的警告訊息，來屬性中的宣告式標記``項目。The following Web page code demonstrates how to assign a custom warning message to the property in declarative markup in the `` element. [!code-aspx-csharp[WebParts_WebPartManager_CloseProviderWarning#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/WebParts_WebPartManager_CloseProviderWarning/CS/webpartmanagerConnectionCS.aspx#1)] [!code-aspx-vb[WebParts_WebPartManager_CloseProviderWarning#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/WebParts_WebPartManager_CloseProviderWarning/VB/webpartmanagerConnectionVB.aspx#1)] 您已載入網頁瀏覽器中之後，請按一下**顯示模式**下拉式清單控制項，然後選取**Connect**切換頁面，即可連接模式。After you have loaded the Web page in a browser, click the **Display Mode** drop-down list control and select **Connect** to switch the page to connect mode. 連接模式使用``項目，可讓您建立控制項之間的連線。Connect mode uses the `` element to enable you to create connections between controls. 在連線模式中，按一下標題列中的向下箭號**郵遞區號**控制項來啟用它的動詞命令功能表中，然後按一下**Connect**。In connect mode, click the downward arrow in the title bar of the **ZIP Code** control to activate its verbs menu, and then click **Connect**. 連接使用者介面 (UI) 會出現之後，請按一下**建立取用者的連接**連結。After the connection user interface (UI) appears, click the **Create a connection to a Consumer** link. 資料格會顯示具有下拉式清單控制項。A cell appears that has a drop-down list control. 選取 **天氣控制項**中的下拉式清單中，按一下**Connect**完成兩個控制項的連線。Select **Weather Control** in the drop-down list, and click **Connect** to complete the connection of the two controls. 按一下 **關閉**，然後使用**顯示模式**頁面返回標準瀏覽模式的下拉式清單。Click **Close**, and then use the **Display Mode** drop-down list to return the page to normal browse mode. 最後，按一下 的動詞命令功能表**郵遞區號**控制項 （此為提供者控制項在此情況下），並選取**關閉**。Finally, click the verbs menu for the **ZIP Code** control (which is the provider control in this case) and select **Close**. 自訂訊息給您指派給屬性會顯示。The custom message you assigned to the property is displayed.

param.span: A or server control that is being closed in a .

summary.span: Closes a control in such a way that it is not rendered on a Web page, but can be reopened.

span.span: Closes a control in such a way that it is not rendered on a Web page, but can be reopened.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 方法會移除或其他伺服器控制項，使它不會是原本包含網頁上呈現。The method removes a or other server control so that it is not rendered on the Web page that originally contained it. 已關閉的控制項新增至物件，它會維護已關閉的控制項的參考，並且可讓要還原至頁面的控制項。The closed control is added to a object, which maintains a reference to the closed control and makes it possible for the control to be restored to the page. 已關閉控制項仍然會出現在所參考的集合屬性。A closed control still appears in the collection referenced by the property. 關閉控制項與不同刪除它。Closing a control is different from deleting it. 已關閉的控制項仍然能夠還原至 頁面上，但已刪除的控制項執行個體便會永久移除和絕對無法還原。Closed controls are still available to be restored to a page, but a deleted control instance is permanently removed and can never be restored. 無論或伺服器控制項 （在頁面標記中宣告） 的靜態或動態 （新增至頁面以程式設計方式或由使用者從 Web 組件類別目錄），您可以關閉並重新開啟頁面上。Regardless of whether a or server control is static (declared in the markup of a page) or dynamic (added to the page programmatically or by a user from a Web Parts catalog), it can be closed and reopened on a page. 一般而言，使用者可以關閉按一下其動詞命令功能表然後選取 關閉動詞命令的控制項。Typically, users can close a control by clicking its verbs menu and selecting the close verb. 控制項也可以透過直接呼叫關閉方法並傳遞它的參考`webPart`。A control can also be closed by directly calling the method and passing it a reference to `webPart`. 在頁面上， ，也都已關閉的控制項，如果開發人員宣告``項目，並在其中新增``項目，它會提供使用者頁面還原關閉的控制項，在執行階段中使用簡單的使用者介面 (UI)。On a page where controls have been closed, if a developer declares an `` element, and within it adds an `` element, it provides a simple user interface (UI) for users to restore closed controls to the page at run time. 使用者可以將頁面切換成目錄顯示模式，並已關閉的控制項將會出現在頁面目錄中。Users can switch the page into catalog display mode, and the closed controls will appear within the page catalog. 使用者可以選取 已關閉的控制項，並將它們新增至頁面上的任意位置中，他們想要和選取的控制項是還原至頁面，然後正常地呈現。Users can select closed controls and add them back to the page at whatever position they desire, and then the selected controls are restored to the page and rendered as normal. 當呼叫方法，它會引發數個事件︰ ， （如果有多個控制項），和（如果有連接的控制項）。When the method is called, it raises several events: , (if there are multiple controls), and (if there are connected controls). 通常開發人員可以取消這些事件，但在某些情況下不可能取消它們。Normally developers can cancel these events, but in certain cases it is not possible to cancel them. 如需詳細資訊，請參閱文件， ，和事件。For details, see the documentation for the , , and events. ## Examples 下列程式碼範例會示範如何使用 方法。The following code example demonstrates how to use the method. 在程式碼範例包含四個部分：The code example has four parts: - 使用者控制項，可讓您變更網頁顯示模式。A user control that enables you to change page display modes. - 自訂控制項。A custom control. - Web 網頁。A Web page. - 此範例在瀏覽器中的運作方式的說明。An explanation of how the example works in a browser. 在程式碼範例的第一個部分是變更顯示模式的使用者控制項。The first part of the code example is the user control for changing display modes. 您可以取得使用者控制項的原始程式碼範例區段的類別概觀。You can obtain the source code for the user control from the Example section of the class overview. 如需有關顯示模式，以及使用者控制的運作方式的詳細資訊，請參閱 < [ 逐步解說： 變更 Web 組件頁面上顯示的模式](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/24e42f74-82dc-4c13-8574-130398985fc0)。For more information about display modes and how the user control works, see [Walkthrough: Changing Display Modes on a Web Parts Page](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/24e42f74-82dc-4c13-8574-130398985fc0). 在程式碼範例的第二個部分是自訂控制項。The second part of the code example is the custom control. 若要執行程式碼範例，您必須編譯這個原始程式碼。For the code example to run, you must compile this source code. 您可以明確編譯它，然後將產生的組件放在您的網站的 Bin 資料夾或全域組件快取。You can compile it explicitly and put the resulting assembly in your Web site's Bin folder or the global assembly cache. 或者，您可以將原始程式碼放在您網站的 App_Code 資料夾中，這樣就會在執行階段進行動態編譯。Alternatively, you can put the source code in your site's App_Code folder, where it will be dynamically compiled at run time. 此範例會使用動態編譯的方法;因此沒有任何`Assembly`屬性中`Register`指示詞，這個網頁頂端的控制項。This example uses the dynamic compilation approach; thus there is no `Assembly` attribute in the `Register` directive for this control at the top of the Web page. 如需示範如何編譯的逐步解說，請參閱 < [ 逐步解說： 開發和使用自訂 Web 伺服器控制項](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/6d90782a-a1a4-45a6-b2d4-cf6362b83b08)。For a walkthrough that demonstrates how to compile, see [Walkthrough: Developing and Using a Custom Web Server Control](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/6d90782a-a1a4-45a6-b2d4-cf6362b83b08). [!code-csharp[WebParts_WebPartManager_CloseWebPart#3](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/WebParts_WebPartManager_CloseWebPart/CS/textdisplaywebpart.cs#3)] [!code-vb[WebParts_WebPartManager_CloseWebPart#3](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/WebParts_WebPartManager_CloseWebPart/VB/textdisplaywebpart.vb#3)] 在程式碼範例的第三個部分是網頁。The third part of the code example is the Web page. 此頁面包含區域中，使用 <`asp:pagecatalogpart>`在其中宣告之項目。The page contains a zone, with an <`asp:pagecatalogpart>` element declared within it. 這是將會包含哪些內容的封閉型控制項，並讓使用者將它加入至頁面。This is what will contain the closed control and enable users to add it back to the page. `Button1_Click`方法會直接呼叫方法以關閉自訂控制，不過使用者也可以關閉透過動詞命令功能表。The `Button1_Click` method directly calls the method to close the custom control, although a user can also close the control through the verbs menu. [!code-aspx-csharp[WebParts_WebPartManager_CloseWebPart#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/WebParts_WebPartManager_CloseWebPart/CS/closeWebPartCS.aspx#1)] [!code-aspx-vb[WebParts_WebPartManager_CloseWebPart#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/WebParts_WebPartManager_CloseWebPart/VB/closeWebPartVB.aspx#1)] 在瀏覽器頁面載入之後，請關閉自訂控制按一下控制項的標頭中的動詞命令功能表 （箭號符號），然後按一下**關閉**。After you load the page in a browser, close the custom control by clicking the verbs menu (the arrow symbol) in the header of the control, and clicking **Close**. 現在將頁面變更為目錄模式中，選取變更**Catalog**中**顯示模式**下拉式清單控制項。Now change the page to catalog mode by selecting **Catalog** in the **Display Mode** drop-down list control. 頁面類別目錄會顯示已關閉的控制項。The page catalog appears with the closed control. 選取 已關閉的控制項旁的核取方塊，按一下**新增**以將它新增至頁面上，然後按一下**關閉**返回頁面，即可瀏覽模式。Select the check box next to the closed control, click **Add** to add it to the page, and then click **Close** to return the page to browse mode. 控制項被還原頁面。The control is restored to the page. 現在將它關閉，這次請再次依序按一下**關閉網頁組件** 按鈕。Now close it again, this time by clicking the **Close WebPart** button.

MemberSignature.Value: Public Shared ReadOnly ConnectDisplayMode As WebPartDisplayMode

summary.span: Represents the display mode used for displaying a special user interface (UI) for users to manage connections between controls.

span.span: Represents the display mode used for displaying a special user interface (UI) for users to manage connections between controls.

summary.span: This field is read-only.

span.span: This field is read-only.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 欄位會參考自訂建立和所包含的物件控制項。The field references a custom object that is created and contained by the control. 因為這是靜態物件，您可以參考它直接透過類別，而不需要控制項的執行個體。Because this is a static object, you can refer to it directly through the class without needing an instance of the control. 當使用者想要管理之間的連線控制項在網頁上，如果已宣告區域在頁面上，它們可以切換至頁面模式。When users want to manage connections between controls on a Web page, if a zone has been declared on the page, they can switch the page into the mode. 連接顯示模式顯示特殊的 UI 來管理連接，其中包含連接或中斷連接的控制項，並編輯現有連線的詳細資料的能力。The connect display mode displays a special UI for managing connections, which includes the ability to connect or disconnect controls, and to edit the details of existing connections. 如果您想要讓使用者能夠使用 Web 組件控制集所提供的 UI 中的連線，您必須宣告``頁面標記中的項目。If you want to provide users with the ability to manage connections with the UI provided by the Web Parts control set, you must declare an `` element in the markup of a page. 不同於其他類型的項目區域，您不需要新增任何其他標記這個項目內，您只是宣告的項目本身。Unlike the elements for the other types of zones, you do not need to add any other tags within this element; you simply declare the element by itself. ## Examples 下列程式碼範例示範使用模式。The following code example demonstrates the usage of the mode. 在程式碼範例有三個部分：The code example has three parts: - 原始程式檔，其中包含介面和自訂控制項，可構成的連接。A source file that contains an interface and custom controls that can form a connection. - 網頁上，提供連接 UI，並示範使用模式。A Web page that provides a connection UI and demonstrates working with the mode. - 如何執行範例的說明。An explanation of how to run the example. 在程式碼範例的第一個部分是原始程式檔，其中包含介面和兩個自訂的設計是讓它們可以同時連線的控制項。The first part of the code example is a source file that contains an interface and two custom controls that are designed so they can be connected. 若要執行程式碼範例，您必須編譯這個原始程式碼。For the code example to run, you must compile this source code. 您可以明確編譯它，然後將產生的組件放在您的網站的 Bin 資料夾或全域組件快取。You can compile it explicitly and put the resulting assembly in your Web site's Bin folder or the global assembly cache. 或者，您可以將原始程式碼放在您網站的 App_Code 資料夾中，這樣就會在執行階段進行動態編譯。Alternatively, you can put the source code in your site's App_Code folder, where it will be dynamically compiled at run time. 此程式碼範例會使用動態編譯的方法。This code example uses the dynamic compilation approach. 如需示範如何編譯的逐步解說，請參閱 < [ 逐步解說： 開發和使用自訂 Web 伺服器控制項](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/6d90782a-a1a4-45a6-b2d4-cf6362b83b08)。For a walkthrough that demonstrates how to compile, see [Walkthrough: Developing and Using a Custom Web Server Control](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/6d90782a-a1a4-45a6-b2d4-cf6362b83b08). [!code-csharp[WebParts_WebPartManager_ConnectDisplayMode#2](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/WebParts_WebPartManager_ConnectDisplayMode/CS/ZipCodeComponent.cs#2)] [!code-vb[WebParts_WebPartManager_ConnectDisplayMode#2](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/WebParts_WebPartManager_ConnectDisplayMode/VB/ZipCodeComponent.vb#2)] 此範例的第二個部分是裝載的自訂控制項的網頁。The second part of the example is a Web page that hosts the custom controls. 在伺服器內`

remarks.format: ## Remarks 屬性可用來存取目前頁面上連接的集合。The property provides a way to access the current set of connections on a page. 集合本身是唯讀的並想要管理集合的特定連線開發人員應該使用這類方法和。The collection itself is read-only, and developers who want to manipulate a specific connection from the collection should use methods such as and . ## Examples 下列程式碼範例示範宣告式和以程式設計方式使用控制項。The following code example demonstrates declarative and programmatic use of the control. 在程式碼範例包含四個部分：The code example has four parts: - 使用者控制項，可讓您變更 Web 組件頁面上的顯示模式。A user control that enables you to change display modes on a Web Parts page. - 包含兩個自訂的網頁可以連接的控制項和``項目。A Web page that contains two custom controls that can be connected, and an `` element. - 原始程式碼檔，其中包含兩個自訂控制項和自訂的介面。A source code file that contains two custom controls and a custom interface. - 此範例在瀏覽器中的運作方式的說明。An explanation of how the example works in a browser. 下列程式碼包含只有網頁的部分範例。The following code contains only the Web page portion of the example. 您也需要自訂使用者控制項和先前所述的自訂控制項的原始程式碼。You will also need the custom user control and the source code for the custom controls mentioned above. 從的範例 > 一節中取得這兩項類別概觀。Obtain these two items from the Example section of the class overview. 下列網頁程式碼示範如何使用屬性以程式設計方式取得頁面上的目前連線數的計數。The following Web page code demonstrates how to use the property programmatically to get the count of current connections on a page. 請注意，在`

MemberSignature.Value: Public Custom Event ConnectionsActivated As EventHandler

summary.span: Occurs after all the current Web Parts connections on a page are not only connected, but have also begun actively sharing data between the consumer and provider controls involved in each connection.

span.span: Occurs after all the current Web Parts connections on a page are not only connected, but have also begun actively sharing data between the consumer and provider controls involved in each connection.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 在連線的生命週期，在頁面完成載入程序之後，就會發生此事件。In the life cycle of connections, this event occurs after a page completes its loading process. 這也會發生之後事件，只表示或參與之特定連線的伺服器控制項已成功連接。It also occurs after the event, which indicates only that the or server controls involved in a specific connection have successfully connected. 萬一其中有多個連線，在頁面上，方法會指示所有頁面上的有效 Web 組件連線都已作用中，以共用資料。In a case where there are multiple connections on a page, the method indicates that all the valid Web Parts connections on a page are now active and able to share data. 了解所有連接都作用中，開發人員可以執行任意數目的工作，包括通知使用者狀態的所有連線時，通知處理和顯示資料，其提供者，然後依此類推的消費者控制項。Knowing that all connections are active, developers can carry out any number of tasks, including notifying users of the status of all the connections, notifying consumer controls to process and display data from their providers, and so on. 此事件相關聯方法，它會引發事件，並讓開發人員建立自訂事件處理常式。This event is associated with the method, which raises the event and allows developers to create custom handlers for the event. 網頁程式開發人員可以建立自訂事件處理常式加`OnConnectionsActivated`屬性設定為``頁面，並再將自訂的方法名稱指派給屬性中的項目。Page developers can create a custom handler for the event by adding the `OnConnectionsActivated` attribute to the `` element in the page, and then assigning a custom method name to the attribute.

summary.span: Occurs during the process of activating all the established Web Parts connections on a Web page.

span.span: Occurs during the process of activating all the established Web Parts connections on a Web page.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 在連線的生命週期，此事件會發生頁面之前完成載入程序，呼叫方法。In the life cycle of connections, this event occurs as a page is completing its loading process, just before the method is called. 它是不同於事件，這牽涉到特定連線之間或其他伺服器控制項。It is different from the event, which involves a particular connection between or other server controls. 當頁面上，所有可能的連接已連線，而且即將啟動時，就會發生事件。The event occurs when all the possible connections on a page have been connected and are about to be activated. 事件相關聯方法，這會引發事件。The event is associated with the method, which raises the event. 控制項開發人員想要擴充可以加入至頁面的連線類型可以覆寫受保護方法並且啟用其他類型的連線。Control developers who want to extend the type of connections that can be added to a page could override the protected method and activate additional types of connections. 網頁程式開發人員可以建立自訂事件處理常式加`OnConnectionsActivating`屬性設定為``頁面，並再將自訂的方法名稱指派給屬性中的項目。Page developers can create a custom handler for the event by adding the `OnConnectionsActivating` attribute to the `` element in the page, and then assigning a custom method name to the attribute.

summary.span: Creates a connection between two controls (or other server controls capable of forming connections) that reside in a zone.

span.span: Creates a connection between two controls (or other server controls capable of forming connections) that reside in a zone.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 方法會形成連接之間的任何兩個可以連接的控制項。The method forms a connection between any two controls that can be connected. 之前呼叫這個方法，以建立連線，您也可以呼叫中條件式的檢查，以確保控制項符合需求的建立連接的方法。Before calling this method to create a connection, you might also want to call the method in a conditional check to ensure that the controls meet the requirements for forming a connection. > [!NOTE] > 您也可建立不是兩個伺服器控制項之間的連線控制項。It is also possible to create a connection between two server controls that are not controls. 一般情況下，兩個控制項必須以進行自訂伺服器控制項 (例如繼承的控制項或現有的 ASP.NET 伺服器控制項)，讓您可以新增必要的成員。In general, the two controls would have to be custom server controls (for example, controls that inherit from or existing ASP.NET server controls) so that you could add the required members. 控制項也必須符合以下指定之需求。The controls would also have to meet the requirements specified below. 連線的情況下，兩個控制項之間的任何型別必須符合下列需求，要能夠連線：Any type of connection scenario between two controls must meet the following requirements to be able to connect: - 每個控制項位於（它不一定要相同的區域） 的區域。Each control resides in a zone (it does not have to be the same zone). - Web 組件控制集實作時，連接之中提供者控制項實作介面的公用方法來做為提供者的回呼，並已為`ConnectionProvider`方法，將其識別為提供者連接上的中繼資料屬性點。As implemented in the Web Parts control set, the provider control in a connection implements an interface as a public method that serves as a callback to the provider, and has a `ConnectionProvider` metadata attribute on the method to identify it as a provider connection point. 因為擷取提供者連接點是虛擬的方法，衍生控制項不一定要使用相同的中繼資料屬性。Because the method that retrieves provider connection points is virtual, a derived control does not necessarily have to use the same metadata attribute. - Web 組件控制集實作時，連接之中消費者控制項也會有特殊的方法，讓它能夠在提供者的回呼方法中，會公開介面的參考，而且取用者有`ConnectionConsumer`上的中繼資料屬性方法，將其識別為消費者連接點。As implemented in the Web Parts control set, the consumer control in a connection also has a special method that enables it to get a reference to the interface that is exposed in the provider's callback method, and the consumer has a `ConnectionConsumer` metadata attribute on the method to identify it as a consumer connection point. 因為擷取取用者連接點是虛擬的方法，衍生控制項不一定要使用相同的中繼資料屬性。Because the method that retrieves consumer connection points is virtual, a derived control does not necessarily have to use the same metadata attribute. - 回呼方法必須是相容、 中 （亦即，取用者和提供者可以共用的資料直接） 提供者的回呼方法或開發人員提供的介面，取用者可以使用的型別必須使用物件從提供者將資料轉換的取用者可以使用的表單。The callback methods must either be compatible, in that the consumer can use the type of interface supplied in the provider's callback method (meaning that the consumer and provider can share data directly), or the developer must use a object to transform the data from the provider into a form that the consumer can use. > [!IMPORTANT] > 當您不需要轉換程式時，使用方法多載。When you do not need a transformer, use the method overload. 當您需要轉換程式時，使用方法多載。When you need a transformer, use the method overload.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 這個多載用於連接控制項，其連接點充分相容，而且可以連線而不使用時物件。This overload is used to connect controls when their connection points are sufficiently compatible that they can connect without using a object. 當呼叫這個方法的多載時，它只會傳遞至另一個多載版本; 方法的呼叫，並將傳遞`null`參數需要物件。When this overload of the method is called, it simply passes the call to the other overloaded version of the method, and passes `null` for the parameter that requires a object. 當您嘗試以程式設計方式連線兩個控制項時，您可以使用中條件式的檢查，以判斷是否可以直接連線之控制項的方法。When you attempt to connect two controls programmatically, you can use the method in a conditional check to determine whether the controls can be directly connected. ## Examples 下列程式碼範例示範如何使用這個方法來以程式設計方式建立連接。The following code example demonstrates how to use this method to create a connection programmatically. 完整的程式碼才能執行範例時，請參閱 < 範例 > 一節的類別概觀。For the full code required to run the example, see the Example section of the class overview. 從該範例中，您需要可讓您變更顯示模式，在頁面上，使用者控制項的原始程式碼和原始碼的兩個自訂控制項。From that example, you will need the source code for the user control that allows you to change display modes on the page, and the source code for the two custom controls. 裝載兩個網頁的程式碼會控制如下所示。The code for the Web page that hosts the two controls follows. 此頁面使用`Register`頂端指示詞來宣告的使用者控制項和自訂控制項。The page uses `Register` directives at the top to declare the user control and the custom controls. 自訂控制項接著會以宣告方式內參考``項目。The custom controls are then referenced declaratively within an `` element. 處理的程式碼`Button1_Click`方法會建立使用控制項之間連接方法。The code that handles the `Button1_Click` method creates a connection between the controls by using the method. [!code-aspx-csharp[WebParts_WebPartManager_ConnectWebParts1#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/WebParts_WebPartManager_ConnectWebParts1/CS/wpmgrConnectWebPartsCS.aspx#1)] [!code-aspx-vb[WebParts_WebPartManager_ConnectWebParts1#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/WebParts_WebPartManager_ConnectWebParts1/VB/wpmgrConnectWebPartsVB.aspx#1)] 在瀏覽器頁面載入之後，請按一下**連接 WebPart 控制項**連接 按鈕。After you load the page in a browser, click the **Connect WebPart Controls** button to form the connection. 您接著可以在文字方塊中，輸入一些資料，然後按一下**輸入 5 位數郵遞區號**示範連接控制項，，和在第一個控制項中輸入該資料會在第二個更新的按鈕。You can then enter some data in the text box, and click the **Enter 5-digit ZIP Code** button to demonstrate that the controls are connected, and that data entered in the first control is updated in the second.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 這個多載用來連接其連接點不相容時的控制項。This overload is used to connect controls when their connection points are incompatible. 不相容的問題發生時`consumer`實作不同的介面比`provider`為其連接點。The incompatibility occurs when `consumer` implements a different interface than `provider` as its connection point. 轉換器會將資料轉換成可以理解的型別`consumer`。The transformer converts the data into a type that can be understood by `consumer`.

Web 組件控制項集合，以及在它不是從您的程式碼呼叫大部分的開發情況下，將使用這個屬性。This property is used by the Web Parts control set, and in most development situations it is not intended to be called from your code. 基於這個理由，雖然此屬性是公用的它會隱藏 IntelliSense。For this reason, although the property is public, it is hidden from IntelliSense. 開發人員想要存取的集合或由其他伺服器控制項控制項應使用其屬性。Developers who want to access the collection of or other server controls managed by the control should use its property.

returns.span: A to be added to a page.

span.span: A to be added to a page.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 您不能呼叫直接從程式碼的方法。You cannot call the method directly from your code. 這個方法會在內部呼叫控制項新增新的動態的程序的一部分或頁面伺服器控制項。This method is called internally by the control as part of the process of adding a new dynamic or server control to a page. 動態控制項已加入至頁面以程式設計方式或透過 Web 組件的使用者介面 (UI)，例如由使用者從目錄的控制項，而不是直接在網頁標記中宣告為靜態控制項，加入控制項。A dynamic control is added to a page programmatically or through the Web Parts user interface (UI), for example by a user adding a control from a catalog of controls, as opposed to a static control, which is declared directly in the markup of a page. > [!NOTE] > 可以在衍生類別中覆寫方法，如果開發人員想要啟用的方法，以處理其他控制項複製案例。The method can be overridden in a derived class if developers want to enable the method to handle additional control copying scenarios. 如需詳細資訊，請參閱注意事項繼承者注意事項 > 一節。For details, see the Notes to Inheritors section. 當新動態新增控制項時，才控制項，方法會傳回控制項的新執行個體。When a new dynamic control is added, if it is a control, the method returns a new instance of the control. 如果要加入的控制項是其他類型的伺服器控制項 （例如使用者控制項、 自訂控制項或 ASP.NET 控制項），控制項將會有已包裝與由 Web 組件控制項集合的物件。If the control being added is some other type of server control (such as a user control, a custom control, or an ASP.NET control), the control will already have been wrapped with a object by the Web Parts control set. 當方法遇到控制項，它會傳回的新執行個體控制項包裝在其中的子控制項的新執行個體。When the method encounters a control, it returns a new instance of the control with a new instance of the child control wrapped within it. 當方法會建立傳回控制項的新複本，它也會重設所有屬性的值設為預設值。When the method creates a new copy of a control to return, it also resets the values of all the properties to their default values. 請注意，是否您想要保留可個人化屬性的值，並擁有其複製到新的控制項執行個體，您應該呼叫以及方法。Note that, if you want to preserve the values of the personalizable properties and have them copied to the new control instance, you should call the method as well. 最後一個步驟藉由實行方法是呼叫方法，以取得新的控制項識別碼。The final step carried out by the method is to call the method to obtain a new ID for the control. > [!NOTE] > 方法會取得新複製的控制項識別碼，因為您不應該仰賴依據參考其原始的 id 加入至頁面的動態控制項Because the method obtains a new ID for a copied control, you should not rely on referencing a dynamic control that is added to a page by its original ID. 相反地，您應該參考方法所傳回的控制項的新執行個體。Instead, you should reference the new instance of the control returned by the method.

span.para: 方法宣告為使開發人員無法繼承自類別，覆寫方法，並提供其他情況下，它可以在其中建立控制項的複本。比方說，方法可以選擇性地接收做為輸入已經序列化至 XML 檔案的控制項。方法無法還原序列化的 XML （如果有的話），並接著呼叫基底方法以處理現有的案例，並傳回的新執行個體控制項。

The method is declared as so that developers could inherit from the class, override the method, and provide for additional scenarios in which it could create copies of controls. For example, the method could optionally receive as input a control that has been serialized into an XML file. The method could deserialize the XML (if present), and then call the base method to handle the existing cases and to return a new instance of a control.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 這個方法會建立所有可能的顯示模式，不只是支援特定的頁面上的顯示模式的清單。This method creates the list of all possible display modes, not just the display modes supported on a particular page. 如需有關支援的顯示模式的詳細資訊，請參閱屬性。For more information about the supported display modes, see the property. 根據預設，Web 組件控制項集合會建立下列集合要使用 Web 組件頁面上的顯示模式：By default, the Web Parts control set creates the following set of display modes to be used on Web Parts pages: - - - - - 開發人員可以建立自訂的顯示模式，不論是否有隨附的自訂衍生自的區域或類別。Developers can create custom display modes, either with or without accompanying custom zones that derive from the or classes. 若要建立自訂的顯示模式，您必須繼承自類別，並將您的顯示模式做為支援的模式，在頁面上，您必須繼承自類別並覆寫方法。To create a custom display mode, you must inherit from the class, and to add your display mode as a supported mode on a page, you must inherit from the class and override the method. 當您使用新增的顯示模式時方法，您應該加入它們要才會出現在任何使用者介面 (UI) 控制項的順序 (例如控制項)，為使用者提供可能的顯示模式的頁面上。When you add display modes by using the method, you should add them in the order that you want them to appear in any user interface (UI) controls (such as a control) that provide to users the possible display modes on a page. ## Examples 下列程式碼範例會示範如何使用 方法。The following code example demonstrates how to use the method. 在程式碼範例包含五個部分：The code example has five parts: - 使用者控制項，可讓您變更 Web 組件頁面上的顯示模式。A user control that enables you to change display modes on a Web Parts page. - 裝載其他控制項的網頁。A Web page that hosts the other controls. - 使用者控制項位於網頁上的區域，並可讓您輸入，並在標籤中顯示的文字。A user control that resides in a zone on the Web page, and enables you to enter and display text in a label. - 原始程式碼檔，其中包含兩個控制項。A source code file that contains two controls. 其中一個是自訂控制項，以及其他是自訂来加入至頁面的預設顯示模式物件。One is a custom control, and the other is a custom object to add to the page's default display modes. - 原始程式碼檔，其中包含兩個自訂控制項和自訂的介面。A source code file that contains two custom controls, and a custom interface. - 此範例在瀏覽器中的運作方式的說明。An explanation of how the example works in a browser. 在程式碼範例的第一個部分是變更顯示模式的使用者控制項。The first part of the code example is the user control for changing display modes. 您可以取得使用者控制項的原始程式碼範例區段的類別概觀。You can obtain the source code for the user control from the Example section of the class overview. 如需有關顯示模式，以及使用者控制的運作方式的詳細資訊，請參閱 < [ 逐步解說： 變更 Web 組件頁面上顯示的模式](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/24e42f74-82dc-4c13-8574-130398985fc0)。For more information about display modes and how the user control works, see [Walkthrough: Changing Display Modes on a Web Parts Page](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/24e42f74-82dc-4c13-8574-130398985fc0). 此範例的第二個部分是網頁。The second part of the example is the Web page. 它包含兩個控制項，使用者控制項和自訂控制項。It contains two controls, both user controls, and the custom control. 請注意`Register`在頁面頂端的指示詞參考的使用者控制項和編譯控制項的命名空間。Notice the `Register` directives at the top of the page to reference the user controls and namespace for the compiled controls. [!code-aspx-csharp[Webparts_WebPartManager_CreateDisplayModes#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/WebParts_WebPartManager_CreateDisplayModes/CS/createDisplayModeCS.aspx#1)] [!code-aspx-vb[Webparts_WebPartManager_CreateDisplayModes#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/WebParts_WebPartManager_CreateDisplayModes/VB/createDisplayModeVB.aspx#1)] 此範例的第三個部分是輸入和顯示文字的使用者控制項。The third part of the example is the user control for entering and displaying text. 它會使用控制項來建立多個檢視的 UI。It uses a control to create multiple views of the UI. 一個檢視會顯示`Button1`按鈕，另外一個則沒有。One view appears with the `Button1` button, the other without. 請注意，在覆寫`OnPreRender`方法，將程式碼會檢查是否頁面目前為自訂的顯示模式，如果是的話，會顯示第一個使用者控制項，其中包含按鈕的檢視。Notice that in the overridden `OnPreRender` method, the code checks to see whether the page is currently in the custom display mode and, if so, displays the first view of the user control, which includes the button. 如果網頁不為自訂的顯示模式，例如，如果頁面是在瀏覽] 或 [設計模式中，會隱藏按鈕。If the page is not in the custom display mode, for example if the page is in browse or design mode, the button is hidden. [!code-aspx-csharp[Webparts_WebPartManager_CreateDisplayModes#2](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/WebParts_WebPartManager_CreateDisplayModes/CS/TextDisplaycs.ascx#2)] [!code-aspx-vb[Webparts_WebPartManager_CreateDisplayModes#2](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/WebParts_WebPartManager_CreateDisplayModes/VB/TextDisplayvb.ascx#2)] 此範例的第四個部分是兩個自訂類別的原始程式檔。The fourth part of the example is the source file for the two custom classes. 請注意，自訂類別會覆寫方法，以及它會先呼叫基底方法，將所有的預設顯示模式，並將新增自訂的顯示模式。Notice that the custom class overrides the method, and that it first calls the base method to add all the default display modes, and then adds the custom display mode. 自訂的顯示模式類別`InLineEditDisplayMode`，只要繼承自管理員、 設定的顯示模式名稱的建構函式，並會覆寫一些基底屬性，以建立自訂的顯示特性。The custom display mode class, `InLineEditDisplayMode`, simply inherits from , sets the name of the display mode in the constructor, and overrides a number of the base properties to establish the characteristics of the custom display. 若要執行程式碼範例，您必須編譯這個原始程式碼。For the code example to run, you must compile this source code. 您可以明確編譯它，然後將產生的組件放在您的網站的 Bin 資料夾或全域組件快取。You can compile it explicitly and put the resulting assembly in your Web site's Bin folder or the global assembly cache. 或者，您可以將原始程式碼放在您網站的 App_Code 資料夾中，這樣就會在執行階段進行動態編譯。Alternatively, you can put the source code in your site's App_Code folder, where it will be dynamically compiled at run time. 如需示範如何編譯的逐步解說，請參閱 < [ 逐步解說： 開發和使用自訂 Web 伺服器控制項](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/6d90782a-a1a4-45a6-b2d4-cf6362b83b08)。For a walkthrough that demonstrates how to compile, see [Walkthrough: Developing and Using a Custom Web Server Control](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/6d90782a-a1a4-45a6-b2d4-cf6362b83b08). [!code-csharp[Webparts_WebPartManager_CreateDisplayModes#3](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/WebParts_WebPartManager_CreateDisplayModes/CS/CustomDisplayMode.cs#3)] [!code-vb[Webparts_WebPartManager_CreateDisplayModes#3](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/WebParts_WebPartManager_CreateDisplayModes/VB/CustomDisplayMode.vb#3)] 若要執行的程式碼範例，請瀏覽器頁面載入。To run the code example, load the page in a browser. 請注意，頁面目前是在瀏覽 模式中，與任何按鈕是可見的。Notice that the page is currently in browse mode, and no button is visible. 使用**顯示模式**下拉式清單控制項中，變更頁面，即可**內嵌編輯顯示**模式，並注意現在`Button1`按鈕會顯示在下方的使用者控制項。Using the **Display Mode** drop-down list control, change the page to **Inline Edit Display** mode, and notice that now the `Button1` button is visible in the lower user control. 新增一些文字，然後按一下按鈕來更新控制項。Add some text, and click the button to update the control. 請注意，若要瀏覽模式，會傳回頁面顯示，現在會顯示您所輸入的文字，因為頁面不會再將自訂的顯示模式中，會再次隱藏按鈕。Notice that the page display is returned to browse mode, the text you entered is now displayed, and the button is once again hidden because the page is no longer in the custom display mode.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 當控制項加入至網頁，它們可以是 （亦即在網頁標記中宣告的控制項） 的靜態或動態 （亦即它們會以程式設計方式加入）。When controls are added to a Web page, they can be static (which means the control is declared in the page markup) or dynamic (which means they are added programmatically). 在任何情況其中控制項建立新的動態控制項，將新增至頁面上，它會呼叫這個方法，以產生唯一的識別碼。In any scenario where the control is creating new dynamic controls to add to the page, it calls this method to generate a unique ID. 方法是虛擬的讓開發人員可以覆寫它如果他們想要提供自訂的實作，以產生識別碼The method is virtual so that developers can override it if they want to provide a custom implementation for generating the ID.

summary.span: Creates a special control that is inserted into a page and displayed for end users, when an attempt to load or create a dynamic control fails for some reason.

span.span: Creates a special control that is inserted into a page and displayed for end users, when an attempt to load or create a dynamic control fails for some reason.

span.span: An that is inserted into a page in place of a control that failed to be loaded or created.

remarks.format: ## Remarks Web 組件控制集嘗試載入或建立的動態執行個體時，會呼叫方法或伺服器控制項和它因為某些原因失敗。The method is called when the Web Parts control set attempts to load or create an instance of a dynamic or server control, and it fails for some reason. 此方法會建立物件，將錯誤訊息指派給它，並將它傳回。The method creates an object, assigns an error message to it, and returns it. 控制項插入以取代無法的控制項和其錯誤訊息會顯示在頁面上。The control is inserted in place of the control that failed, and its error message is displayed on the page. 您不能呼叫直接從程式碼的方法。You cannot call the method directly from your code. 不過，您可以繼承自類別，並擴充方法。However, you can inherit from the class and extend the method. 如需詳細資訊，請參閱繼承者一節的資訊。For details, see the Notes for Inheritors section. 使用者可以使用控制項在網頁中大部分一般一樣控制項。End users can work with an control in a page much like they would a normal control. 若要移除的錯誤訊息，他們可以關閉控制項，即可關閉動詞命令，此時將控制項加入至物件，如同任何其他已關閉的控制項。To remove the error message, they can close the control by clicking the close verb, at which point the control will be added to a object, like any other closed control. 如果使用者刪除也會從頁面刪除控制項，無法載入伺服器控制項。If an end user deletes an control, the server control that failed to load will also be deleted from the page.

span.para: 如果您想要自訂會在傳回的資訊您可以覆寫控制項，方法，呼叫基底方法，將不同的值指派給基底方法，傳遞的參數，然後傳回產生的控制項。比方說，如果您不想讓使用者看到（它會顯示使用者控制項的虛擬目錄路徑） 的值，當您呼叫基底方法，您可以傳遞空字串 ("") 為該參數。您也可以自訂的行為控制本身，藉由繼承自它。例如，您可能想要覆寫其或屬性。

If you want to customize the information that is returned in the control, you can override the method, call the base method, assign different values to the parameters passed to the base method, and then return the resulting control. For example, if you do not want end users to see the value (which would show the virtual directory path of a user control), when you call the base method you could pass an empty string ("") for that parameter. You can also customize the behavior of the control itself, by inheriting from it. For example, you might want to override its or property.

summary.span: Wraps a server control that is not a control with a object, so that the control can have Web Parts functionality.

span.span: Wraps a server control that is not a control with a object, so that the control can have Web Parts functionality.

returns.span: A that wraps and enables it to function as a true control.

span.span: A that wraps and enables it to function as a true control.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 方法是啟用伺服器控制項所沒有的主要機制控制項，以取得相同的功能上控制項，因此完全參與 Web 組件的應用程式。The method is the main mechanism for enabling server controls that are not controls to take on the same functionality as a control, and thus to participate fully in Web Parts applications. 使用此方法中，開發人員大幅擴展他們可以使用 Web 組件應用程式中的伺服器控制項數目，因為幾乎所有類型的伺服器控制項，可以使用標準 ASP.NET 控制項、 使用者控制項和自訂控制項。By using this method, developers vastly expand the number of server controls that they can use in a Web Parts application, because virtually any type of server control--standard ASP.NET controls, user controls, and custom controls--can be used. 控制項也會使用這個方法在其他兩個案例中包裝伺服器控制項提供物件。The control also uses this method in two other scenarios to wrap server controls with a object. 當使用者新增至頁面使用伺服器控制項控制項，如果匯入的控制項不是控制項，呼叫方法。When users add server controls to a page by using the control, if the imported control is not a control, the method is called. 此外，當伺服器控制項宣告中的持續性格式網頁上的區域方法會針對不是任何控制項呼叫控制項。Also, when server controls are declared in persistence format within a zone on a Web page, the method is called for any controls that are not controls. 當您將伺服器控制項加入區域以程式設計的方式時，是使用一般的方法方法，以使用控制項物件，然後再呼叫方法，將控制項加入至集合的所有在頁面上，所參考的控制項屬性。When you add a server control to a zone programmatically, a typical approach is to use the method to wrap the control with a object, and then call the method to add the control to the collection of all controls on the page, which is referenced by the property. ## Examples 下列程式碼範例示範使用方法。The following code example demonstrates use of the method. 在`Button2_Click method`，則呼叫方法來包裝用來控制再將它新增至區域的物件。In the `Button2_Click method`, the method is called to wrap a control with a object before adding it to the zone. [!code-aspx-csharp[WebParts_WebPartManager_DeleteWebPart#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/WebParts_WebPartManager_DeleteWebPart/CS/wpmgDeleteWebPartCS.aspx#1)] [!code-aspx-vb[WebParts_WebPartManager_DeleteWebPart#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/WebParts_WebPartManager_DeleteWebPart/VB/wpmgDeleteWebPartVB.aspx#1)]

span.para: 可以覆寫此方法，以使用衍生類別改為提供的 Web 組件的基底類別的控制項集合。
This method can be overridden to use a derived class instead of the base class provided with the Web Parts control set.
