Public Overridable Property DeleteWarning As String
public: virtual property System::String ^ DeleteWarning { System::String ^ get(); void set(System::String ^ value); };
member this.DeleteWarning : string with get, set

summary.span: Gets or sets a custom warning message displayed to end users when they delete a control.

span.span: Gets or sets a custom warning message displayed to end users when they delete a control.

value.span: 字串，包含文字的警告訊息。

span.span: A string that contains the text of the warning message.

value.span: 預設值是當地語系化的警告訊息。

span.span: The default value is a localized warning message.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 當使用者刪除控制項，通常會顯示預設警告訊息。When a user deletes a control, normally a default warning message is displayed. 它會警告使用者，在刪除控制項的這個執行個體時，會永久刪除。It warns the user that when this instance of a control is deleted, the deletion is permanent. 網頁開發人員可能會提供使用者得以加入至頁面控制項的新執行個體 (例如目錄控制項，或透過一些程式設計的方式)，但是永久移除已刪除的控制項的目前執行個體。The page developer might provide users with a way to add a new instance of the control to the page (such as through a catalog of controls, or through some programmatic means), but the current instance of a control that is deleted is permanently removed. 如有需要，會顯示警告對話方塊中會包含要取消刪除動作，使用者 按鈕。The dialog box that displays the warning includes a button for the user to cancel the deletion, if desired. 屬性可讓開發人員設定會對使用者顯示警告訊息。The property enables developers to set the warning message that is displayed to the user. 如果頁面開發人員指派為空字串 ("") 會顯示於此屬性沒有警告訊息 對話方塊中的值，當使用者刪除控制項。If a page developer assigns an empty string ("") value to this property, no warning message dialog box will be shown when a user deletes a control. > [!NOTE] > 屬性不會顯示在靜態控制項和伺服器控制項。The property is not displayed in the case of static controls and server controls. 靜態控制項是伺服器控制項中已宣告Web 網頁標記中的區域。Static controls are server controls that are declared within a zone in the markup of a Web page. 這類控制項是靜態的因為它們不能刪除，所以刪除警告訊息永遠不會顯示在此情況下。Because such controls are static, they cannot be deleted, so the delete warning message is never displayed in that case. 可由使用者關閉靜態控制項，但已關閉的控制項加入頁面目錄中，在其中它可以加入至頁面的使用者，而永遠無法復原刪除的控制項。Static controls can be closed by a user, but a closed control is added to the page catalog, from which it can be added back to the page by a user, whereas a deleted control can never be recovered. ## Examples 下列程式碼範例示範使用屬性以宣告方式和程式設計的方式。The following code example demonstrates the use of the property declaratively and programmatically. 有四個部分的程式碼範例：There are four parts to the code example: - 使用者控制項，可讓您變更網頁顯示模式。A user control that enables you to change page display modes. - 自訂控制項。A custom control. - Web 網頁。A Web page. - 此範例在瀏覽器中的運作方式的說明。An explanation of how the example works in a browser. 在程式碼範例的第一個部分是變更顯示模式的使用者控制項。The first part of the code example is the user control for changing display modes. 您可以取得使用者控制項的原始程式碼範例區段的類別概觀。You can obtain the source code for the user control from the Example section of the class overview. 如需有關顯示模式，以及使用者控制的運作方式的詳細資訊，請參閱 < [ 逐步解說： 變更 Web 組件頁面上顯示的模式](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/24e42f74-82dc-4c13-8574-130398985fc0)。For more information about display modes and how the user control works, see [Walkthrough: Changing Display Modes on a Web Parts Page](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/24e42f74-82dc-4c13-8574-130398985fc0). 在程式碼範例的第二個部分是自訂控制項。The second part of the code example is the custom control. 若要執行程式碼範例，您必須編譯這個原始程式碼。For the code example to run, you must compile this source code. 您可以明確編譯它，然後將產生的組件放在您的網站的 Bin 資料夾或全域組件快取。You can compile it explicitly and put the resulting assembly in your Web site's Bin folder or the global assembly cache. 或者，您可以將原始程式碼放在您網站的 App_Code 資料夾中，這樣就會在執行階段進行動態編譯。Alternatively, you can put the source code in your site's App_Code folder, where it will be dynamically compiled at run time. 此範例會使用動態編譯的方法;因此沒有任何`Assembly`屬性中`Register`指示詞，這個網頁頂端的控制項。This example uses the dynamic compilation approach; thus there is no `Assembly` attribute in the `Register` directive for this control at the top of the Web page. 如需示範如何編譯的逐步解說，請參閱 < [ 逐步解說： 開發和使用自訂 Web 伺服器控制項](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/6d90782a-a1a4-45a6-b2d4-cf6362b83b08)。For a walkthrough that demonstrates how to compile, see [Walkthrough: Developing and Using a Custom Web Server Control](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/6d90782a-a1a4-45a6-b2d4-cf6362b83b08). [!code-csharp[WebParts_WebPartManager_DeleteWarning#3](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/WebParts_WebPartManager_DeleteWarning/CS/textdisplaywebpart.cs#3)] [!code-vb[WebParts_WebPartManager_DeleteWarning#3](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/WebParts_WebPartManager_DeleteWarning/VB/textdisplaywebpart.vb#3)] 在程式碼範例的第三個部分是網頁。The third part of the code example is the Web page. 此頁面包含區域，以自訂控制宣告在區域中，以便使用者可以將它新增至頁面在執行階段。The page contains a zone, with the custom control declared in the zone, so that a user can add it to the page at run time. 請注意，可以從頁面刪除僅動態控制項 （以程式設計方式或從這類目錄加入至頁面的控制項）。Note that only dynamic controls (controls that are added to a page programmatically or from a catalog like this one) can be deleted from a page. 靜態控制項 (控制項中已宣告頁面標記中的區域) 可以關閉，但永遠不會刪除。Static controls (controls that are declared within a zone in the markup of a page) can be closed, but never deleted. ``項目宣告的自訂值屬性使用`DeleteWarning`屬性。The `` element declares a custom value for the property by using the `DeleteWarning` attribute. `Button1_Click`方法會將指派到另一個自訂值屬性。The `Button1_Click` method assigns another custom value to the property. [!code-aspx-csharp[WebParts_WebPartManager_DeleteWarning#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/WebParts_WebPartManager_DeleteWarning/CS/deleteWarningCS.aspx#1)] [!code-aspx-vb[WebParts_WebPartManager_DeleteWarning#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/WebParts_WebPartManager_DeleteWarning/VB/deleteWarningVB.aspx#1)] 在瀏覽器頁面載入之後，您需要新增控制項加入網頁。After you load the page in a browser, you need to add the control to the page. 使用**顯示模式**下拉式清單控制項中，選取類別目錄的模式。Using the **Display Mode** drop-down list control, select catalog mode. 目錄出現時，請選取自訂控制項旁的核取方塊，按一下**新增**以將它新增至頁面上，然後按一下**關閉**返回頁面，即可瀏覽模式。When the catalog appears, select the check box next to the custom control, click **Add** to add it to the page, and then click **Close** to return the page to browse mode. 既然控制項為可見，您可以將它刪除。Now that the control is visible, you can delete it. 使用**顯示模式**控制一次，請將頁面切換到設計模式中 （您無法刪除控制項頁面瀏覽模式時）。Using the **Display Mode** control again, switch the page into design mode (you cannot delete controls while the page is in browse mode). 按一下標頭中的動詞命令功能表 （箭號符號）控制項，然後選取**刪除**。Click the verbs menu (the arrow symbol) in the header of the control, and select **Delete**. 您在設定的警告`DeleteWarning`屬性會出現。The warning that you set on the `DeleteWarning` attribute appears. 按一下 **取消**。Click **Cancel**. 現在按一下 按鈕**變更刪除的警告**，其中以程式設計方式變更的屬性值。Now click the button labeled **Change Delete Warning**, which changes the property value programmatically. 從控制項上的動詞命令功能表中選取**刪除**同樣地，並請注意，此時會出現另一個警告訊息。From the verbs menu on the control, select **Delete** again, and notice that this time the other warning message appears.

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig instance void DeleteWebPart(class System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart webPart) cil managed

param.name: webPart
param.span: The server control to be deleted.

span.span: The server control to be deleted.

summary.span: Permanently removes a dynamic instance of a control from a Web page.

span.span: Permanently removes a dynamic instance of a control from a Web page.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 方法永久移除所代表的控制項`webPart`從頁面的參數。The method permanently removes the control represented by the `webPart` parameter from a page. 不同於已關閉的控制，已新增到控制項，並可以加入上一步 頁面上，已刪除的控制項執行個體可以永遠不會加入至頁面。Unlike a closed control, which is added to the control and can be added back to the page, a deleted control instance can never be added back to the page. > [!NOTE] > 所實作的 Web 組件控制項設定，可讓使用者刪除動態控制項取決於使用者並控制已加入至頁面的個人化範圍。As implemented by the Web Parts control set, the ability for users to delete a dynamic control depends on the user and the personalization scope in which the control was added to a page. 如果控制項加入網頁時在共用範圍中 （由使用者具有權限），然後控制項無法刪除個別的使用者當頁面位於使用者範圍。If the control is added when the page is in shared scope (by a user who has permissions), then the control cannot be deleted by individual users when the page is in user scope. 只有動態控制項，才能刪除。Only dynamic controls can be deleted. 動態控制項都加入至頁面中，以程式設計方式或由使用者從目錄加入控制項。Dynamic controls are added to a page programmatically or by users adding controls from a catalog. 靜態控制項加入以宣告方式中的標記或持續性格式的頁面。Static controls are added to a page declaratively in the markup or persistence format. 由於宣告的標籤是永久存在於標記，可以永遠不會刪除靜態控制項，但可以關閉並重新開啟。Because the declarative tags are permanently present in the markup, static controls can never be deleted, but they can be closed and reopened. ## Examples 下列程式碼範例會示範如何使用 方法。The following code example demonstrates how to use the method. 第一次**加入行事曆**按一下按鈕時，程式碼在事件處理常式會建立控制項，並將它新增至區域物件。The first time the **Add Calendar** button is clicked, the code in the event handler creates a control, and adds it to a zone as a object. 以程式設計方式加入控制項，因為它是動態的控制項，並因此會刪除。Because the control is added programmatically, it is a dynamic control, and therefore it can be deleted. 當使用者按一下**刪除行事曆** 按鈕，程式碼可確保控制項存在，而且然後將它刪除藉由呼叫方法。When a user clicks the **Delete Calendar** button, the code ensures that the control exists, and then deletes it by calling the method. [!code-aspx-csharp[WebParts_WebPartManager_DeleteWebPart#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/WebParts_WebPartManager_DeleteWebPart/CS/wpmgDeleteWebPartCS.aspx#1)] [!code-aspx-vb[WebParts_WebPartManager_DeleteWebPart#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/WebParts_WebPartManager_DeleteWebPart/VB/wpmgDeleteWebPartVB.aspx#1)]

MemberSignature.Value: Public Shared ReadOnly DesignDisplayMode As WebPartDisplayMode

summary.span: Represents the display mode used for changing the layout of Web pages that contain Web Parts controls.

span.span: Represents the display mode used for changing the layout of Web pages that contain Web Parts controls.

summary.span: This field is read-only.

span.span: This field is read-only.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 欄位會參考自訂建立和所包含的物件控制項。The field references a custom object that is created and contained by the control. 因為這是靜態物件，您可以參考它直接透過類別，而不需要控制項的執行個體。Because this is a static object, you can refer to it directly through the class without needing an instance of the control. 包含 Web 組件的頁面控制項第一次載入時，在（瀏覽模式） 的預設值。When a page that contains Web Parts controls first loads, it is in (browse mode) by default. 當使用者想要變更頁面的配置將控制項移至不同的區域，或在目前的區域時，他們必須先切換頁面以（設計模式）。When users want to change the layout of the page by moving controls to different zones or within the current zones, they must first switch the page to (design mode). 在設計模式中，各種區域的使用者介面 (UI) 出現，而且使用者可以拖曳控制項，以變更配置。In design mode, the user interface (UI) for the various zones appears, and users can then drag controls to change the layout. ## Examples 下列程式碼範例示範如何使用欄位以程式設計的方式。The following code example demonstrates how to work with the field programmatically. 程式碼會填入下拉式清單中，支援的顯示模式] 頁面上，在此情況下為 [瀏覽和設計。The code populates a drop-down list with the supported display modes for the page, which in this case are browse and design. 請注意，在`Page_PreRender`方法中，程式碼會檢查是否目前屬性設定為。Notice that, in the `Page_PreRender` method, the code checks whether the current property is set to . 如果是的話`Label1`會顯示，如果沒有的話，`Label1`會隱藏。If so, `Label1` will be visible, and if not, `Label1` will be hidden. [!code-aspx-csharp[WebParts_WebPartManager_DesignDisplayMode#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/WebParts_WebPartManager_DesignDisplayMode/CS/wpmgrDesignDisplayModecs.aspx#1)] [!code-aspx-vb[WebParts_WebPartManager_DesignDisplayMode#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/WebParts_WebPartManager_DesignDisplayMode/VB/wpmgrDesignDisplayModevb.aspx#1)] 在瀏覽器頁面載入之後，您就預設的瀏覽模式。After you load the page in a browser, you are in browse mode by default. 請注意頁面上的標籤會隱藏。Notice that the label on the page is hidden. 使用下拉式清單控制項，將頁面切換到設計模式。Use the drop-down list control to switch the page to design mode. 請注意，因為中的程式碼`Page_PreRender`方法中，標籤現在會顯示。Notice that, because of the code in the `Page_PreRender` method, the label is now visible.

abstract member DisconnectWebPart : System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart -> unit override this.DisconnectWebPart : System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart -> unit

param.name: webPart
param.span: A control that is to be disconnected.

span.span: A control that is to be disconnected.

summary.span: Removes a or server control that is being closed or deleted from any connections it is participating in.

span.span: Removes a or server control that is being closed or deleted from any connections it is participating in.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 方法會在內部呼叫時的控制項在網頁上關閉或從頁面刪除設定的 Web 組件控制項。The method is called internally by the Web Parts control set when a control is either closed on a page or deleted from a page. 在這類案例中，會呼叫方法來移除任何連線中的控制項，它牽涉到做為消費者或提供者。In such a scenario, the method is called to remove the control from any connections where it is involved as a consumer or provider. 如果控制項已移除從任何連線，此方法也會呼叫方法以結束所在的任何連線`webPart`是相關。If the control is removed from any connection, this method also calls the method to end any connections in which `webPart` was involved. 當呼叫方法時，它會引發事件。When the method is called, it raises the event. 通常您可以取消這個事件，但兩種情況便無法取消。Normally this event can be cancelled, but in two cases it cannot be cancelled. 一種情況發生在要求期間 頁面上，當呼叫方法。One case occurs during requests to the page, when the method is called. 如果沒有現有連接，任何衝突會叫用方法，以關閉其中一個衝突的連線，並在這個執行個體，也無法予以取消事件，因為必須解決衝突。If there is a conflict among existing connections, the method will be invoked to close one of the conflicting connections, and in this instance the event cannot be cancelled, because the conflict must be resolved. 在另一個案例，就會發生時或伺服器控制項目前連接關閉或刪除。The other case occurs when a or server control that is currently connected is either closed or deleted. 在此情況下，因為控制項正在從移除頁面上，而終止，因此根據設計，不可能取消其連線需求中斷結束連接的程序的事件。In this case, because of the control is being removed from the page, its connection needs to be terminated as well, therefore by design it is not possible to cancel the event to interrupt the process of ending a connection. 如需詳細資訊，請參閱 事件。For more information, see the event. ## Examples 下列程式碼範例會示範如何使用 方法。The following code example demonstrates how to use the method. 使用兩個自訂控制項，網頁可以可讓您藉由按一下按鈕，而另一個按鈕可讓您中斷連接控制項的控制項之間建立連線。Using two custom controls, the Web page enables you to create a connection between the controls by clicking a button, while another button enables you to disconnect the controls. 如果您的控制項時關閉此分頁為瀏覽模式中，且控制項連接時，覆寫方法中斷連線已關閉的控制項、 結束連接，並顯示訊息。If you close one of the controls while the page is in browse mode and the controls are connected, an override of the method disconnects the closed control, ends the connection, and displays a message. 在程式碼範例包含四個部分：The code example has four parts: - 變更顯示模式的使用者控制項。A user control for changing display modes. - 原始程式檔，其中包含自訂控制項。A source file containing custom controls. - 裝載控制項的網頁。A Web page to host the controls. - 此範例在瀏覽器中的運作方式的說明。An explanation of how the example works in a browser. 在程式碼範例的第一個部分是變更顯示模式的使用者控制項。The first part of the code example is the user control for changing display modes. 您可以取得使用者控制項的原始程式碼範例區段的類別概觀。You can obtain the source code for the user control from the Example section of the class overview. 如需有關顯示模式，以及使用者控制的運作方式的詳細資訊，請參閱 < [ 逐步解說： 變更 Web 組件頁面上顯示的模式](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/24e42f74-82dc-4c13-8574-130398985fc0)。For more information about display modes and how the user control works, see [Walkthrough: Changing Display Modes on a Web Parts Page](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/24e42f74-82dc-4c13-8574-130398985fc0). 第二個部分是包含兩個自訂的原始程式碼檔案將會連接的控制項和自訂控制項。The second part is the file containing the source code for the two custom controls that will be connected, and a custom control. 若要執行程式碼範例，您必須編譯這個原始程式碼。For the code example to run, you must compile this source code. 您可以明確編譯它，然後將產生的組件放在您的網站的 Bin 資料夾或全域組件快取。You can compile it explicitly and put the resulting assembly in your Web site's Bin folder or the global assembly cache. 或者，您可以將原始程式碼放在您網站的 App_Code 資料夾中，這樣就會在執行階段進行動態編譯。Alternatively, you can put the source code in your site's App_Code folder, where it will be dynamically compiled at run time. 此範例會使用動態編譯，因此`Register`參考這些元件在網頁中的指示詞會據以宣告網頁的頂端。This example uses dynamic compilation, so the `Register` directive that references these components in the Web page is declared accordingly at the top of the Web page. 如需示範編譯選項的逐步解說，請參閱 < [ 逐步解說： 開發和使用自訂 Web 伺服器控制項](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/6d90782a-a1a4-45a6-b2d4-cf6362b83b08)。For a walkthrough that demonstrates compiling options, see [Walkthrough: Developing and Using a Custom Web Server Control](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/6d90782a-a1a4-45a6-b2d4-cf6362b83b08). 在原始程式碼中，請注意繼承的控制項`MyWebPartManager`會覆寫方法。In the source code, notice the inherited control `MyWebPartManager` that overrides the method. 這個方法會檢查在頁面中，以查看是否正在關閉的控制項參與連線，如果是的話，會呼叫每個連線方法來結束連接。This method checks each connection in a page to see whether the control being closed participates in the connection and, if so, calls the method to end the connection. 這等同於在方法的基底實作控制項。This is identical to the base implementation of the method in the control. 然後，覆寫的方法會藉由將訊息寫入網頁自訂基底實作。The overridden method then customizes the base implementation by writing a message to the page. [!code-csharp[WebParts_WebPartManager_DisconnectWebParts#2](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/WebParts_WebPartManager_DisconnectWebParts/CS/ZipCodeComponent.cs#2)] [!code-vb[WebParts_WebPartManager_DisconnectWebParts#2](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/WebParts_WebPartManager_DisconnectWebParts/VB/ZipCodeComponent.vb#2)] 在程式碼範例的第三個部分是網頁。The third part of the code example is the Web page. 請注意，最上方，它包含`Register`註冊使用者控制項，並具有動態編譯的組件的指示詞控制項。Notice that near the top, it contains `Register` directives to register the user control, and the dynamically compiled assembly with the controls. 頁面有兩種主要方法。The page has two primary methods. `Button1_Click`方法會建立控制項之間的連線時`Button2_Click`方法中斷連接控制項。The `Button1_Click` method creates a connection between the controls, while the `Button2_Click` method disconnects the controls. [!code-aspx-csharp[WebParts_WebPartManager_DisconnectWebParts#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/WebParts_WebPartManager_DisconnectWebParts/CS/wpmgrDisconnectWebPartsCS.aspx#1)] [!code-aspx-vb[WebParts_WebPartManager_DisconnectWebParts#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/WebParts_WebPartManager_DisconnectWebParts/VB/wpmgrDisconnectWebPartsVB.aspx#1)] 將頁面載入之後，請按一下**Connect**連接控制項的按鈕。After you load the page, click the **Connect** button to connect the controls. 然後按一下 [動詞] 功能表中其中一個控制項 （控制項的標頭中的向下箭頭），並選取**關閉**從動詞命令功能表。Then click the verbs menu in one of the controls (the downward arrow in the header of the control), and select **Close** from the verbs menu. 當您嘗試關閉的控制項時，覆寫的方法會呼叫、 連線就會結束，並將訊息寫入至頁面。When you try to close the control, the overridden method is called, the connection is ended, and the message is written to the page. 如果您想要重設頁面，即可還原關閉的控制項並嘗試使用其他選項，請按一下**重設使用者狀態**移除個人化資料，並還原網頁的原始狀態的連結。If you want to reset the page to restore the closed control and experiment with other options, click the **Reset User State** link to remove personalization data and restore the page's original state.

span.span: Carries out the process of disconnecting server controls that are connected on a Web page.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 方法會執行完整的程序的結束之間的連線或伺服器控制項，當您將它傳遞`connection`參數。The method carries out the complete process of ending a connection between or server controls, when you pass it the `connection` parameter. 這個方法用來中斷連接控制項，當您將``網頁，以管理連線時，提供使用者介面 (UI) 中的項目。This method is used to disconnect controls when you place an `` element in a Web page, to provide a user interface (UI) for managing connections. 當頁面處於連線顯示模式 ()，和目前的連線存在，使用者可以按一下按鈕，以呼叫方法來結束連接。When a page is in connect display mode (), and a current connection exists, users can click a button that calls the method to end the connection. 您也可以呼叫方法，直接從程式碼，如果您想要中斷連接控制項，以程式設計的方式，以及無需將``至頁面的項目。You can also call the method directly from your code, if you want to disconnect controls programmatically and without having to add an `` element to a page. ## Examples 下列程式碼範例會示範如何使用 方法。The following code example demonstrates how to use the method. 使用兩個自訂控制項，網頁可以可讓您藉由按一下按鈕，而另一個按鈕可讓您中斷連接控制項的控制項之間建立連線。Using two custom controls, the Web page enables you to create a connection between the controls by clicking a button, while another button enables you to disconnect the controls. 在程式碼範例包含四個部分：The code example has four parts: - 變更顯示模式的使用者控制項。A user control for changing display modes. - 原始程式檔，其中包含自訂控制項。A source file containing custom controls. - 裝載控制項的網頁。A Web page to host the controls. - 此範例在瀏覽器中的運作方式的說明。An explanation of how the example works in a browser. 在程式碼範例的第一個部分是變更顯示模式的使用者控制項。The first part of the code example is the user control for changing display modes. 您可以取得使用者控制項的原始程式碼範例區段的類別概觀。You can obtain the source code for the user control from the Example section of the class overview. 如需有關顯示模式，以及使用者控制的運作方式的詳細資訊，請參閱 < [ 逐步解說： 變更 Web 組件頁面上顯示的模式](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/24e42f74-82dc-4c13-8574-130398985fc0)。For more information about display modes and how the user control works, see [Walkthrough: Changing Display Modes on a Web Parts Page](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/24e42f74-82dc-4c13-8574-130398985fc0). 第二個部分是包含兩個自訂的原始程式碼檔將連接的控制項。The second part is a file containing the source code for the two custom controls that will be connected. 若要執行程式碼範例，您必須編譯這個原始程式碼。For the code example to run, you must compile this source code. 您可以明確編譯它，然後將產生的組件放在您的網站的 Bin 資料夾或全域組件快取。You can compile it explicitly and put the resulting assembly in your Web site's Bin folder or the global assembly cache. 或者，您可以將原始程式碼放在您網站的 App_Code 資料夾中，這樣就會在執行階段進行動態編譯。Alternatively, you can put the source code in your site's App_Code folder, where it will be dynamically compiled at run time. 此範例會使用動態編譯，因此`Register`參考這些元件在網頁中的指示詞會據以宣告網頁的頂端。This example uses dynamic compilation, so the `Register` directive that references these components in the Web page is declared accordingly at the top of the Web page. 如需示範編譯選項的逐步解說，請參閱 < [ 逐步解說： 開發和使用自訂 Web 伺服器控制項](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/6d90782a-a1a4-45a6-b2d4-cf6362b83b08)。For a walkthrough that demonstrates compiling options, see [Walkthrough: Developing and Using a Custom Web Server Control](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/6d90782a-a1a4-45a6-b2d4-cf6362b83b08). [!code-csharp[WebParts_WebPartManager_DisconnectWebParts#2](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/WebParts_WebPartManager_DisconnectWebParts/CS/ZipCodeComponent.cs#2)] [!code-vb[WebParts_WebPartManager_DisconnectWebParts#2](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/WebParts_WebPartManager_DisconnectWebParts/VB/ZipCodeComponent.vb#2)] 在程式碼範例的第三個部分是網頁。The third part of the code example is the Web page. 請注意，最上方，它包含`Register`註冊使用者控制項，並具有動態編譯的組件的指示詞控制項。Notice that near the top, it contains `Register` directives to register the user control and the dynamically compiled assembly with the controls. 頁面有兩種主要方法。The page has two primary methods. `Button1_Click`方法會建立控制項之間的連線和`Button2_Click`方法中斷連接控制項。The `Button1_Click` method creates a connection between the controls, and the `Button2_Click` method disconnects the controls. [!code-aspx-csharp[WebParts_WebPartManager_DisconnectWebParts#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/WebParts_WebPartManager_DisconnectWebParts/CS/wpmgrDisconnectWebPartsCS.aspx#1)] [!code-aspx-vb[WebParts_WebPartManager_DisconnectWebParts#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/WebParts_WebPartManager_DisconnectWebParts/VB/wpmgrDisconnectWebPartsVB.aspx#1)] 將頁面載入之後，您可以按一下**Connect**連接控制項的按鈕。After you load the page, you can click the **Connect** button to connect the controls. 如果您的文字方塊控制項中，輸入一些文字，然後按一下**Enter** 按鈕，文字將會顯示在連接的控制項 （它將不會顯示如果控制項已中斷連線）。If you enter some text in the text box control, and then click the **Enter** button, the text will be displayed in the connected control (it would not be displayed if the controls were disconnected). 如果您按一下**中斷連線** 按鈕，控制項將會中斷連接。If you click the **Disconnect** button, the controls will be disconnected. 您可以使用，以確認連線狀態的控制項**顯示模式**切換至頁面的下拉式清單控制項**Connect**模式。You can verify the connection status of the controls by using the **Display Mode** drop-down list control to switch the page into **Connect** mode. 之後，按一下 （由箭號表示） 的動詞命令功能表的其中一個控制項，標題列中，選取**Connect**項目。After doing that, click the verbs menu (represented by an arrow) in the title bar of one of the controls, and select the **Connect** item. 連接 UI 會顯示;這是可用的因為沒有``頁面中宣告的項目。The connection UI is displayed; it is available because there is an `` element declared in the page. 您也可以連接並中斷此 UI 的控制項。You can also connect and disconnect the controls from this UI.

span.para: 您可以覆寫方法，如果您想要變更中斷連線的預設實作控制項。如果您覆寫方法，而且您只想要將某些實作新增至現有的方法，您可以呼叫基底方法，在執行自己的程式碼之前。

You can override the method if you want to change the default implementation for disconnecting controls. If you do override the method, and you simply want to add some implementation to the existing method, you can call the base method prior to executing your own code.

public: virtual property System::Web::UI::WebControls::WebParts::WebPartDisplayMode ^ DisplayMode { System::Web::UI::WebControls::WebParts::WebPartDisplayMode ^ get(); void set(System::Web::UI::WebControls::WebParts::WebPartDisplayMode ^ value); };

summary.span: Gets or sets the active display mode for a Web page that contains Web Parts controls.

span.span: Gets or sets the active display mode for a Web page that contains Web Parts controls.

value.span: A ，決定頁面的顯示模式。

span.span: A that determines a page's display mode.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 包含 Web 組件控制項的頁面一律是在其中數個可能的顯示模式。A page that contains Web Parts controls is always in one of several possible display modes. 如需有關顯示模式的詳細資訊，請參閱 < [Web 組件頁面顯示模式](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/cc106284-82dc-4770-98cb-673dbc4ed4c4)。For details about display modes, see [Web Parts Page Display Modes](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/cc106284-82dc-4770-98cb-673dbc4ed4c4). 類別會建立 Web 網頁的顯示模式。The class creates the display modes for a Web page. 使用基底類別，控制項會建立可用在包含 Web 組件控制項的頁面的數個標準的顯示模式物件。Using the base class, the control creates several standard display mode objects that can be used on pages that contain Web Parts controls. 這些標準的顯示模式中所述類別概觀。These standard display modes are described in the class overview. 控制項也會管理使用 Web 組件控制項之網頁的顯示模式。The control also manages the display modes for pages that use Web Parts controls. 使用屬性，控制項會在網頁上保留目前的顯示模式的參考。Using the property, the control keeps a reference to the current display mode on a page. 您也可以使用屬性，以將頁面切換至不同的顯示模式。You can also use the property to switch a page into different display modes. 如需在使用 Web 組件控制項的頁面變更顯示模式的範例，請參閱 < [ 逐步解說： 變更 Web 組件頁面上顯示的模式](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/24e42f74-82dc-4c13-8574-130398985fc0)。For an example of changing display modes on a page that uses Web Parts controls, see [Walkthrough: Changing Display Modes on a Web Parts Page](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/24e42f74-82dc-4c13-8574-130398985fc0). 管理顯示模式，過程控制項也提供事件和顯示模式，例如相關的事件處理常式方法和方法。As part of managing the display mode, the control also provides events and event handlers relating to display modes, such as the method and the method. 這些方法會提供一種機制，自訂頁面的行為，以及加入自訂的顯示模式。These methods provide a mechanism for customizing a page's behavior, and even for adding a custom display mode. ## Examples 下列程式碼範例示範如何以程式設計方式使用屬性。The following code example demonstrates programmatic use of the property. 載入之後在瀏覽器中的，您可以使用靠近頁面底部的按鈕來切換顯示模式。After loading the page in a browser, you can use the buttons near the bottom of the page to switch display modes. 網頁載入時為預設的瀏覽模式。The page is in browse mode by default when it loads. 如果您切換到設計模式，您可以將伺服器控制項從一個區域拖曳到另一個，或安排在一個區域中的兩個控制項。If you switch to design mode, you can drag the server controls from one zone to another, or arrange two controls within one zone. 如果您切換到編輯模式，您可以按一下其中一個伺服器的選取控制項的標頭中的動詞命令功能表**編輯**，並編輯使用提供的編輯使用者介面 (UI) 控制項。If you switch to edit mode, you can click the verbs menu in the header of either of the server controls, select **Edit**, and edit the control using the provided editing user interface (UI). > [!NOTE] > 在 Web 組件的應用程式的顯示模式間切換是很常見，而且要提供一致、 可重複使用的方式，若要這樣做的所有網頁包含 Web 組件控制項。Switching among display modes in a Web Parts application is very common, and you might want to provide a consistent, reusable way to do this on all your pages that contain Web Parts controls. 如範例的使用者控制項變更顯示模式，可以重複使用許多頁面上，請參閱 < [ 逐步解說： 變更 Web 組件頁面上顯示的模式](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/24e42f74-82dc-4c13-8574-130398985fc0)。For an example of a user control that changes display modes and that can be reused on many pages, see [Walkthrough: Changing Display Modes on a Web Parts Page](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/24e42f74-82dc-4c13-8574-130398985fc0). [!code-aspx-csharp[WebParts_WebPartManager_DisplayMode#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/WebParts_WebPartManager_DisplayMode/CS/wpmgrDisplayModecs.aspx#1)] [!code-aspx-vb[WebParts_WebPartManager_DisplayMode#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/WebParts_WebPartManager_DisplayMode/VB/wpmgrDisplayModevb.aspx#1)]

MemberSignature.Value: Public Custom Event DisplayModeChanged As WebPartDisplayModeEventHandler

summary.span: Occurs after the current display mode on a Web Parts page has changed.

span.span: Occurs after the current display mode on a Web Parts page has changed.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 顯示模式是 Web 組件的應用程式中不可或缺的一部分。Display modes are an integral part of Web Parts applications. 當使用者切換至不同的顯示模式，在網頁上時，網頁通常需要非常不同的外觀，根據新的顯示模式的目的。When users switch to a different display mode on a Web page, the page will often take on a very different appearance, depending on the purpose of the new display mode. 顯示模式已變更之後，您可能想要進行某些變更，在使用者介面 (UI)，例如隱藏或顯示特定的控制項，變更所選取的 UI 元素的外觀等等。After a display mode has changed, you might want to make certain changes in the user interface (UI), such as hiding or showing certain controls, changing the appearance of selected UI elements, and so on. > [!NOTE] > 如需有關顯示模式的詳細資訊，請參閱 < [Web 組件頁面顯示模式](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/cc106284-82dc-4770-98cb-673dbc4ed4c4)。For more information on display modes, see [Web Parts Page Display Modes](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/cc106284-82dc-4770-98cb-673dbc4ed4c4). 如需有關如何取用事件的詳細資訊，請參閱[如何： 使用 Web Forms 應用程式中的事件](~/docs/standard/events/how-to-consume-events-in-a-web-forms-application.md)。For more information on consuming events, see [How to: Consume Events in a Web Forms Application](~/docs/standard/events/how-to-consume-events-in-a-web-forms-application.md).

MemberSignature.Value: Public Custom Event DisplayModeChanging As WebPartDisplayModeCancelEventHandler

summary.span: Occurs after a user clicks a verb on a Web page that begins the process of changing to a different display mode.

span.span: Occurs after a user clicks a verb on a Web page that begins the process of changing to a different display mode.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 顯示模式是 Web 組件的應用程式中不可或缺的一部分。Display modes are an integral part of Web Parts applications. 當使用者切換至不同的顯示模式，在網頁上時，網頁通常需要非常不同的外觀，根據新的顯示模式的目的。When users switch to a different display mode on a Web page, the page will often take on a very different appearance, depending on the purpose of the new display mode. 使用者起始的動詞命令，即可變更至新的顯示模式的程序之後，您可能想要在使用者介面 (UI) 中進行某些變更，使用屬性來判斷新的顯示模式是什麼，以及再變更各種 UI項目據此。After a user initiates the process of changing to a new display mode by clicking a verb, you might want to make certain changes in the user interface (UI) by using the property to determine what the new display mode will be, and then changing various UI elements accordingly. 若要這樣做很有用的方式是覆寫自訂 UI 的方法。A useful way to do this is to override the method to customize the UI. > [!NOTE] > 如需有關顯示模式的詳細資訊，請參閱 < [Web 組件頁面顯示模式](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/cc106284-82dc-4770-98cb-673dbc4ed4c4)。For more information on display modes, see [Web Parts Page Display Modes](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/cc106284-82dc-4770-98cb-673dbc4ed4c4). 如需有關如何取用事件的詳細資訊，請參閱[如何： 使用 Web Forms 應用程式中的事件](~/docs/standard/events/how-to-consume-events-in-a-web-forms-application.md)。For more information on consuming events, see [How to: Consume Events in a Web Forms Application](~/docs/standard/events/how-to-consume-events-in-a-web-forms-application.md).

MemberSignature.Value: Public ReadOnly Property DisplayModes As WebPartDisplayModeCollection

summary.span: Gets a read-only collection of all display modes that are associated with a control.

span.span: Gets a read-only collection of all display modes that are associated with a control.

value.span: A ，其中包含一組相關聯的物件控制項。

span.span: A that contains the set of objects associated with the control.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 屬性參考所有相關聯的顯示模式中，相較於屬性，其參考只會使用目前的頁面上 （支援） 的顯示模式。The property references all associated display modes, in contrast with the property, which references only the display modes that are available (supported) on the current page. 兩個提供的顯示模式中，瀏覽和設計，一律都支援頁面。Two of the provided display modes, browse and design, are always supported on a page. 頁面有對應所需的特定顯示模式運作的區域類型時，才會支援其他三種顯示模式、 編輯、 目錄和連線。The other three display modes, edit, catalog, and connections, are supported only when a page has the corresponding type of zone necessary for a particular display mode to work. 例如，如果您的頁面不包含區域中，編輯顯示模式就會出現在所參考的集合屬性，但不是會出現在所參考的集合屬性。For example, if you page does not contain an zone, the edit display mode would appear in the collection referenced by the property, but would not appear in the collection referenced by the property. ## Examples 下列程式碼範例示範以程式設計方式使用屬性。The following code example shows the programmatic use of the property. 程式碼會使用這個屬性，以填入具有所有可用的顯示模式 Web 組件控制項集合中的清單，甚至不是支援目前的頁面上。The code uses this property to populate the list with all the display modes available in the Web Parts control set, even those that are not supported on the current page. 在此情況下，類別目錄並連接的顯示模式不支援，因為其對應所需的區域不在網頁上。In this case, the catalog and connect display modes are not supported, because their corresponding required zones are not on the page. 其他三個顯示模式： 瀏覽、 設計和編輯-支援頁面。The other three display modes--browse, design, and edit--are supported on the page. 編輯模式的支援，因為此頁面包含區域，同時瀏覽，並一律支援設計模式。Edit mode is supported because the page contains an zone, while browse and design modes are always supported. 在瀏覽器頁面載入之後，您可以使用下拉式清單控制項，以切換到設計模式中，瀏覽模式的頁面，然後編輯模式。After you load the page in a browser, you can use the drop-down list control to switch the page from browse mode to design mode, and then to edit mode. 您可以在編輯模式中，按一下下拉式動詞命令功能表中的其中一個伺服器控制項中，標頭，並選取**編輯**編輯控制項。In edit mode, you can click the drop-down verbs menu in the header of one of the server controls, and select **Edit** to edit the control. 請注意，如果您選取**類別目錄**或是**Connect**在下拉式清單中，會產生錯誤頁面。Note that if you select **Catalog** or **Connect** in the drop-down list, an error page is generated. [!code-aspx-csharp[WebParts_WebPartManager_DisplayModes#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/WebParts_WebPartManager_DisplayModes/CS/wpmgrDisplayModescs.aspx#1)] [!code-aspx-vb[WebParts_WebPartManager_DisplayModes#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/WebParts_WebPartManager_DisplayModes/VB/wpmgrDisplayModesvb.aspx#1)]

summary.span: Gets the collection of all dynamic connections that currently exist on a Web page.

value.span: A ，包含頁面上的所有動態連接的參考。

remarks.format: ## Remarks 動態的連接都是以程式設計的方式，而不是以靜態方式建立的連接。Dynamic connections are connections that are created programmatically, as opposed to statically. 靜態連接會建立在 Web Form 網頁的標記宣告。Static connections are created by declaring them in the markup of a Web Forms page. 動態連接被形成程式設計的方式，或使用連接使用者介面 (UI) 建立連線的使用者。Dynamic connections are formed either programmatically, or by a user creating a connection using the connection user interface (UI). 集合，不過它是唯讀和您無法變更其內容，但是提供以程式設計方式存取每個動態連接物件。The collection, though it is read-only and you cannot change its contents, does provide programmatic access to each dynamic connection object. > [!NOTE] > 若要執行常見的作業，例如連接或拔除控制項，開發人員應該使用的公用方法上類別，例如和，而不是嘗試直接修改連接中的物件集合。To perform common operations such as connecting or disconnecting controls, developers should use the public methods on the class, such as and , rather than trying to directly modify connection objects in the collection.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 欄位會參考自訂建立和所包含的物件控制項。The field references a custom object that is created and contained by the control. 因為這是靜態物件，您可以參考它直接透過類別，而不需要控制項的執行個體。Because this is a static object, you can refer to it directly through the class without needing an instance of the control. 包含 Web 組件的頁面控制項第一次載入時，在（瀏覽模式） 的預設值。When a page that contains Web Parts controls first loads, it is in (browse mode) by default. 當使用者想要編輯或修改伺服器控制項時，它們必須先切換至頁面（編輯模式）。When users want to edit or modify a server control, they must first switch the page to (edit mode). 第二，他們必須選取要編輯，請依序按一下 編輯動詞命令，在該控制項的標頭中的動詞命令功能表上的特定伺服器控制項。Second, they must select a specific server control to edit, by clicking the edit verb on the verbs menu in that control's header. 在控制項處於編輯模式之後，編輯使用者介面 (UI) 會出現編輯選取的控制項。After the control is in edit mode, the editing user interface (UI) appears for editing the selected control. 若要啟用編輯模式，在頁面上的，頁面必須至少包含一個區域包含一或多個提供的編輯控制項，例如控制項或自訂的編輯控制項。To enable edit mode on a page, the page must contain at least one zone that includes one or more of the provided editing controls, such as the control, or custom editing controls. ## Examples 下列程式碼範例示範如何使用欄位以程式設計的方式。The following code example demonstrates how to work with the field programmatically. 程式碼會填入下拉式清單中的頁面上，在此情況下會瀏覽、 設計和編輯支援的顯示模式。The code populates a drop-down list with the supported display modes for the page, which in this case are browse, design, and edit. 若要支援編輯，``項目是在頁面中。To support editing, an `` element is in the page. 請注意，在`Page_PreRender`方法中，程式碼會檢查是否目前屬性設定為。Notice that, in the `Page_PreRender` method, the code checks whether the current property is set to . 如果是的話`Label1`會顯示，如果沒有的話，`Label1`會隱藏。If so, `Label1` will be visible, and if not, `Label1` will be hidden. [!code-aspx-csharp[WebParts_WebPartManager_EditDisplayMode#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/WebParts_WebPartManager_EditDisplayMode/CS/wpmgrEditDisplayModecs.aspx#1)] [!code-aspx-vb[WebParts_WebPartManager_EditDisplayMode#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/WebParts_WebPartManager_EditDisplayMode/VB/wpmgrEditDisplayModevb.aspx#1)] 在瀏覽器頁面載入之後，您就預設的瀏覽模式。After you load the page in a browser, you are in browse mode by default. 請注意頁面上，標籤會隱藏起來。Notice the label on the page is hidden. 若要切換至編輯模式頁面使用下拉式清單控制項。Use the drop-down list control to switch the page to edit mode. 請注意，因為中的程式碼`Page_PreRender`方法中，標籤現在會顯示。Notice that, because of the code in the `Page_PreRender` method, the label is now visible. 按一下 **編輯**動詞命令功能表中的其中一個控制項，以啟用該特定控制項的編輯動詞命令。Click the **Edit** verb in the verbs menu on one of the controls, to enable editing of that specific control.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 屬性可讓開發人員若要停用用戶端指令碼。The property provides a way for developers to disable client scripts. 您可能想要停用用戶端指令碼，基於安全考量，或以確保頁面上的所有使用者會都有類似的使用者經驗，即使他們使用不同的瀏覽器。You might want to disable client scripting for security purposes, or to ensure that all users of a page will have a similar user experience, even if they use different browsers. 您可以停用用戶端指令碼，加上`EnableClientScript`屬性設定為元素在網頁上，如下列宣告式的程式碼行所示：You can disable client scripting by adding an `EnableClientScript` attribute to the element on a Web page, as in the following line of declarative code: `` 此外，開發人員可以排除這個屬性藉由繼承自類別及設定預設值`false`。Also, developers could eliminate this property by inheriting from the class and setting the default value to `false`. Web 組件控制項集合會使用用戶端使用者介面 (UI) 和個人化功能，請提供一些用戶端指令碼。The Web Parts control set uses client scripting to provide some of the client user interface (UI) and personalization features. 如果您停用用戶端指令碼、 Web 組件控制項還能運作，但某些功能已停用。If you disable client scripting, Web Parts controls still work, but some features are disabled. 若要將控制項拖曳到不同的區域功能已停用，以及呈現下拉式動詞命令功能表中 （動詞會改為會顯示為控制項的標題列中的連結） 的控制項的標題列中動詞命令的能力。The ability to drag controls into different zones is disabled, along with the ability to render verbs in a drop-down verbs menu in a control's title bar (the verbs are instead displayed as links in the control's title bar).

remarks.format: ## Remarks 控制項會覆寫基底屬性，以確保永遠會傳回的值`true`。The control overrides the base property to ensure that it always returns a value of `true`. 這是因為 Web 組件控制集需要使用佈景主題呈現網頁組件的控制項是控制項的子控制項控制以及構成網頁的使用者介面 (UI)。This is done because the Web Parts control set requires the use of themes to render the Web Parts controls that are child controls of the control and that form the user interface (UI) of a Web page. 比方說，佈景主題用來呈現的各種不同的區域，而中的區域，其中包括各種類型的控制項組件控制項 (繼承自控制項類別)，使用者控制項、 ASP.NET 伺服器控制項，與自訂伺服器控制項。For example, themes are used to render the various zones, and the controls that reside in the zones, including the various types of part controls (controls that inherit from the class), user controls, ASP.NET server controls, and custom server controls. 雖然覆寫屬性會實作為根據其基底屬性的讀取/寫入屬性，因為根據設計必須一律傳回的值，您無法設定屬性， `true`。Although the overridden property is implemented as a read/write property in accordance with its base property, you cannot set the property, because by design it must always return a value of `true`. 如果您嘗試設定屬性，擲回例外狀況。If you attempt to set the property, a exception is thrown.

exception.span: An attempt was made to set the property value.

span.span: An attempt was made to set the property value.

summary.span: Completes the process of connecting a control to another control.

span.span: Completes the process of connecting a control to another control.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 方法完成連線的程序到另一個控制項的控制項。The method finishes the process of connecting a control to another control. 它是對應項目來方法。It is the counterpart to the method. 方法可確保所參考的個人化物件屬性是可修改，因為建立連接是本身的個人化的類型，這是必要條件。The method ensures that the personalization object referenced by the property is modifiable, which is necessary because forming a connection is itself a type of personalization. 方法則可確保物件不是`null`，以及最後會呼叫方法。The method then ensures that the object is not `null`, and finally calls the method.

exception.span: The control referenced by the property is .

span.span: The control referenced by the property is .

span.para: 開發人員需要擴充控制項可能會想要覆寫這個方法在衍生類別中的。有一個方法是呼叫基底方法，然後加入一些額外的自訂處理，或您可能想要完全自訂的整個程序完成控制項之間的連接。

Developers who need to extend the control might want to override this method in a derived class. One approach would be to call the base method and then add some additional custom handling, or you might want to completely customize the entire process of completing a connection between controls.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 方法完成編輯程序控制項。The method finishes the process of editing a control. 它是對應項目來方法。It is the counterpart to the method. 方法可確保所參考的個人化物件屬性是可修改，這是必要的因為編輯控制項是需要個人化變更的程序。The method ensures that the personalization object referenced by the property is modifiable, which is necessary because editing a control is a process that requires personalization changes. 方法則可確保物件不是`null`，以便在目前選取控制項可以變更，但它會呼叫最後方法。The method then ensures that the object is not `null`, so that the currently selected control can change, and finally it calls the method.

exception.span: The control referenced by the property is .

span.span: The control referenced by the property is .

span.para: 開發人員需要擴充控制項可能會想要覆寫這個方法在衍生類別中的。有一個方法是呼叫基底方法，然後加入一些額外的自訂處理，或您可能想要完全自訂 完成編輯控制項的整個程序。比方說，在覆寫方法中，您可以先呼叫基底方法，並再加入一些程式碼，判斷所做的編輯變更和變更清單回到確認使用者的顯示。

Developers who need to extend the control might want to override this method in a derived class. One approach would be to call the base method and then add some additional custom handling, or you might want to completely customize the entire process of completing the editing of a control. For example, in the override method, you could call the base method first, and then add some code that determines what editing changes were made, and displays the list of changes back to the end user as a confirmation.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 當使用者嘗試匯出敏感性狀態資料從控制項，並告訴他們的使用者在訊息方塊中，如果任何要匯出的資料來自已標記為機密的原始程式碼中的成員時，顯示一則警告訊息正在匯出敏感性資料，並提供機會，以取消匯出。When a user attempts to export sensitive state data from a control, if any of the data being exported comes from a member that was marked as sensitive in the source code, a warning message is displayed to the user in a message box, telling them that sensitive data is being exported and providing an opportunity to cancel the export. 開發人員可以藉由設定項目將標示為機密的特定成員的資料`isSensitive`的參數`[Personalizable]`屬性設定為`true`成員上。Developers can mark a specific member's data as sensitive by setting the `isSensitive` parameter of the `[Personalizable]` attribute to `true` on the member. 如需有關這個屬性和參數的詳細資訊，請參閱類別。For more information about this attribute and parameter, see the class. > [!IMPORTANT] > 當您使用 Web 組件的匯出功能時，機密資料可能無法匯出到未經授權的使用者。When you use the export feature of Web Parts, sensitive data could potentially be exported to unauthorized users. 如需如何有效防止這種威脅的詳細資訊，請參閱[保護的 Web 組件頁面](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/8ada6210-ed00-4157-b3e9-a7e87e77caa2)。For details on how to protect against this threat, see [Securing Web Parts Pages](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/8ada6210-ed00-4157-b3e9-a7e87e77caa2). 每當使用者嘗試匯出時，會顯示預設訊息。The default message is displayed whenever users attempt to export. 不過，藉由指派值給屬性，您可以提供自訂的警告訊息。However, by assigning a value to the property, you can provide a custom warning message. ## Examples 下列程式碼範例示範如何以宣告方式使用的屬性。The following code example demonstrates the declarative use of the property. 以下網頁的程式碼會使用標準控制項，並將它放在一個區域。The code for the following Web page uses a standard control and places it in a zone. 控制項將會以包裝控制項在執行階段，這可讓它做為真正控制項。The control will be wrapped with a control at run time, which enables it to act as a true control. 若要表示將控制項設為可匯出，`ExportMode`屬性新增至``項目和屬性值設定為，這表示該敏感性與非敏感性的資料可以匯出。To make the control exportable, an `ExportMode` attribute is added to the `` element, and the attribute value is set to , which means that both sensitive and non-sensitive data can be exported. 也請注意，在``項目，`ExportSensitiveDataWarning`屬性被指派自訂的值。Note also that in the `` element, the `ExportSensitiveDataWarning` attribute is assigned a custom value. 請注意，針對此程式碼範例才能運作，您必須在 Web.config 檔以啟用匯出 Web 組件描述檔案中新增的設定。Note that for the code example to work, there is a setting you must add in the Web.config file to enable exporting Web Parts description files. 請確定您有與網頁相同的目錄中的 Web.config 檔案，此程式碼範例。Ensure that you have a Web.config file in the same directory as the Web page for this code example. 內``區段中，請務必``項目`enableExport`屬性設為`true`，如下列標記。Within the `` section, make sure there is a `` element with an `enableExport` attribute set to `true`, as in the following markup. `` `...` `` [!code-aspx-csharp[WebParts_WebPartManager_ExportSensitiveData#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/WebParts_WebPartManager_ExportSensitiveData/CS/wpmgrExportSensitiveWarningCS.aspx#1)] [!code-aspx-vb[WebParts_WebPartManager_ExportSensitiveData#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/WebParts_WebPartManager_ExportSensitiveData/VB/wpmgrExportSensitiveWarningVB.aspx#1)] 在瀏覽器頁面載入之後，按一下 （以向下箭號表示） 的動詞命令功能表中的控制項，其中包含連結的標題列。After you load the page in a browser, click the verbs menu (represented by a downward arrow) in the title bar of the control that contains the links. 動詞命令功能表中，選取**匯出**，並請注意，出現訊息方塊，這是使用自訂的警告。In the verbs menu, select **Export**, and notice that a message box appears with the custom warning. 如果您想要繼續匯出，請按一下**確定**，這可讓您儲存的 XML 描述檔本機複本與控制項相關的所有資料。If you want to continue with the export, click **OK**, which will allow you to save a local copy of an XML description file with all the data about the control.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 方法會從各種不同的狀態和屬性資料組譯`webPart`到 XML 檔案。The method assembles various state and property data from `webPart` into an XML file. 資料包括控制項本身，包括其組件、 狀態資料和屬性資料的相關資訊。The data includes information about the control itself, including its assembly, state data, and property data. 起始匯出的使用者可以在本機電腦或網路上，以儲存到磁碟的 XML 檔案。The user who initiates the export can save the XML file to disk on the local computer or the network. 其他使用者可以描述的檔案匯入不同的網頁或網站，並套用至另一個執行個體的狀態和屬性資料`webPart`。Other users can then import the description file to a different page or Web site, and apply the state and property data to a different instance of `webPart`. 這提供快速且方便的機制，讓使用者能夠共用及重複使用伺服器控制項，其設定，並也提供開發人員一種控制項的外觀和行為的匯出和匯入的控制項。This provides a fast and convenient mechanism for users to share and reuse their settings on server controls, and it also provides developers with a means to control the appearance and behavior of exported and imported controls. 屬性`webPart`預設不會匯出。Properties on `webPart` are not exported by default. 若要啟用匯出的屬性，您必須將它與標記`[Personalizable]`原始程式碼中的屬性。To enable export of a property, you must mark it with the `[Personalizable]` attribute in the source code. 您可以選擇性地標示為包含機密資料，藉由設定成可匯出的屬性`isSensitive`的參數`[Personalizable]`屬性設定為`true`。You can also optionally mark an exportable property as containing sensitive data, by setting the `isSensitive` parameter of the `[Personalizable]` attribute to `true`. 根據預設，`isSensitive`是`false`。By default, `isSensitive` is `false`. 開發人員可以將參數設定為`true`表示資料是敏感性資訊。Developers can set the parameter to `true` to indicate that the data is sensitive. 若要啟用`webPart`開發人員設定要匯出其屬性值設為（包括所有可個人化和機密屬性），或的匯出除了機密屬性的所有項目.To enable `webPart` to be exported, a developer sets its property value to either (which includes all personalizable and sensitive properties), or to , which exports everything except for sensitive properties. > [!IMPORTANT] > 允許將資料從控制項、 匯出和其他控制項，將資料匯入的使用者需要一些安全性風險。Allowing users to export data from controls, and to import data into other controls, entails some security risks. 開發人員應該使用來保護機密資料，上面所討論的方法，以及如果他們想要避免完全公開資料的風險，則不應啟用匯出上`webPart`完全。Developers should use the approach discussed above to protect sensitive data, and if they want to avoid the risk of exposing data altogether, they should not enable export on `webPart` at all. 如需 Web 組件的安全性問題的詳細資訊，請參閱[保護的 Web 組件頁面](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/8ada6210-ed00-4157-b3e9-a7e87e77caa2)。For details on Web Parts security issues, see [Securing Web Parts Pages](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/8ada6210-ed00-4157-b3e9-a7e87e77caa2).

remarks.format: ## Remarks 方法會覆寫基底方法，並擲回例外狀況，如果呼叫端呼叫的方法。The method overrides the base method, and throws an exception if a caller calls the method. 因為控制項沒有 ui，而且絕不會對使用者顯示，它可以永遠不允許將本身的焦點。Because the control has no UI and is never visible to users, it can never allow focus to be set on itself.

exception.span: A caller tries to call the method, which is not supported in a control that has no UI.

span.span: A caller tries to call the method, which is not supported in a control that has no UI.

span.span: Retrieves the collection of objects that can act as connection points from a server control that is acting as a consumer within a Web Parts connection.

remarks.format: ## Remarks Web 組件連接一律會牽涉到兩個控制項，其中一個做為資料提供者，另一個做為資料的取用者。A Web Parts connection always involves exactly two controls, one acting as the provider of data, the other acting as the consumer of data. 每個控制項都必須有一或多個定義為連接點的方法。Each control must have one or more methods that are defined as connection points. 如果消費者控制項，其連接點會物件。In the case of a consumer control, its connection points are objects. 擷取取用者連接點是必要的步驟中建立 Web 組件連接。Retrieving the consumer connection points is a necessary step in forming a Web Parts connection. 取用者必須永遠有至少一個連接點，能夠建立連線。A consumer must always have at least one connection point to be able to establish a connection. 方法會檢查消費者控制項，並擷取其所有的連接點的集合。The method checks a consumer control and retrieves a collection of all its connection points. 如果控制項沒有連接點，方法會傳回空集合。If a control has no connection points, the method returns an empty collection. ## Examples 下列程式碼範例會示範如何使用 方法。The following code example demonstrates how to use the method. 在程式碼範例包含四個部分：The code example has four parts: - 使用者控制項，可讓您變更 Web 組件頁面上的顯示模式。A user control that enables you to change display modes on a Web Parts page. - 包含兩個自訂的網頁可以連接的控制項和``項目。A Web page that contains two custom controls that can be connected, and an `` element. - 原始程式碼檔，其中包含兩個自訂控制項和自訂的介面。A source code file that contains two custom controls and a custom interface. - 此範例在瀏覽器中的運作方式的說明。An explanation of how the example works in a browser. 在程式碼範例的第一個部分是變更顯示模式的使用者控制項。The first part of the code example is the user control for changing display modes. 您可以取得使用者控制項的原始程式碼範例區段的類別概觀。You can obtain the source code for the user control from the Example section of the class overview. 如需有關顯示模式，以及使用者控制的運作方式的詳細資訊，請參閱主題[逐步解說： 變更 Web 組件頁面上顯示的模式](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/24e42f74-82dc-4c13-8574-130398985fc0)。For more information about display modes and how the user control works, see the topic [Walkthrough: Changing Display Modes on a Web Parts Page](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/24e42f74-82dc-4c13-8574-130398985fc0). Web 網頁的宣告式標記包含`Register`使用者控制項和自訂控制項的指示詞。The declarative markup for the Web page contains `Register` directives for both the user control and the custom controls. 沒有``項目，``項目以包含自訂控制項，並有``項目。There is an `` element, an `` element to contain the custom controls, and an `` element. 請注意，在`Page_Load`方法，將程式碼是否連線已經存在，而且，如果沒有，請定義提供者、 取用者，以及其各自的連接點，會檢查，然後將新的連線新增至所參考的靜態連接集合的屬性。Notice that in the `Page_Load` method, the code checks to see whether a connection already exists and, if not, defines a provider, a consumer, and their respective connection points, and then adds a new connection to the set of static connections referenced by the property. 請注意，會使用擷取的物件方法會傳遞至方法，以判斷是否可以建立兩個控制項之間的連線。Note that the object that is retrieved by using the method is then passed to the method to determine whether a connection between the two controls can be created. [!code-aspx-csharp[WebParts_WebPartManager_StaticConnections#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/WebParts_WebPartManager_StaticConnections/CS/wpmgrStaticConnectionCS.aspx#1)] [!code-aspx-vb[WebParts_WebPartManager_StaticConnections#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/WebParts_WebPartManager_StaticConnections/VB/wpmgrStaticConnectionVB.aspx#1)] 此範例的第三個部分是控制項的原始程式碼。The third part of the example is the source code for the controls. 您可以取得此程式碼和指示，編譯的範例區段類別概觀。You can obtain this code, and instructions for compiling it, from the Example section of the class overview. 您已載入網頁瀏覽器中之後，請按一下**顯示模式**下拉式清單控制項，然後選取**Connect**切換頁面，即可連接模式。After you have loaded the Web page in a browser, click the **Display Mode** drop-down list control and select **Connect** to switch the page to connect mode. 連接模式使用``項目，可讓您建立控制項之間的連線。Connect mode uses the `` element to enable you to create connections between controls. 在連線模式中，按一下標題列中的向下箭號**郵遞區號**控制項來啟用它的動詞命令功能表中，然後按一下**Connect**。In connect mode, click the downward arrow in the title bar of the **ZIP Code** control to activate its verbs menu, and then click **Connect**. 連接使用者介面 (UI) 會出現之後，請注意，連線已經存在的程式碼中包含`Page_Load`方法。After the connection user interface (UI) appears, notice that a connection has already been created by the code contained in the `Page_Load` method. 如果您在稍後的瀏覽器工作階段中返回此頁面，此靜態連接就會將已建立，且不需要重新建立每次頁面載入。If you return to this page in a later browser session, this static connection will already be established and will not need to be recreated each time the page loads.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 方法會很有用的內容中您要擷取目前的參考控制項。The method is useful in contexts where you want to retrieve a reference to the current control. 常見的案例，會發生這個是如果您要撰寫自訂控制項以何種的識別碼在開發期間無法得知將可在其頁面上的控制項。A common scenario where this would occur is if you are writing a custom control that cannot know during development what the ID of the control on its page will be. > [!NOTE] > 方法是靜態的因此您可以直接而不需要的執行個體上呼叫它控制項。The method is static, so you can call it directly without needing an instance of a control. 某些控制項在 Web 組件控制項集合、 這類控制項，具有屬性，可擷取目前的參考控制項。Some controls in the Web Parts control set, such as controls, have a property that can retrieve a reference to the current control. 因此，當使用這類控制項，您應該使用這個屬性來擷取的參照。Hence, when working with such controls, you should use this property to retrieve a reference. 如果您的編碼的內容，您知道的 ID控制項，例如撰寫的 Web 網頁內的內嵌程式碼，它是最簡單且最有效率的直接參考控制項使用其識別碼。If you are coding in a context where you know the ID of the control, such as writing code inline within a Web page, it is simplest and most efficient to refer directly to the control by using its ID. ## Examples 下列程式碼範例會示範如何使用 方法。The following code example demonstrates how to use the method. 此範例有兩個部分： 自訂伺服器控制項，以及裝載控制項的網頁。The example has two parts: a custom server control, and a Web page that hosts the control. 自訂控制項會使用方法來擷取識別碼控制項目前的頁面，然後顯示該識別碼。The custom control uses the method to retrieve the ID of the control on the current page, and then displays the ID. [!code-csharp[WebParts_WebPartManager_GetCurrentWebPartManager#2](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/WebParts_WebPartManager_GetCurrentWebPartManager/CS/MyManagerIDLabel.cs#2)] [!code-vb[WebParts_WebPartManager_GetCurrentWebPartManager#2](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/WebParts_WebPartManager_GetCurrentWebPartManager/VB/MyManagerIDLabel.vb#2)] 下列程式碼範例提供裝載中的控制項之 Web 網頁區域。The following code example provides the Web page that hosts the control in a zone. [!code-aspx-csharp[WebParts_WebPartManager_GetCurrentWebPartManager#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/WebParts_WebPartManager_GetCurrentWebPartManager/CS/getCurrentWPManagerCS.aspx#1)] [!code-aspx-vb[WebParts_WebPartManager_GetCurrentWebPartManager#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/WebParts_WebPartManager_GetCurrentWebPartManager/VB/getcurrentWPManagervb.aspx#1)] 在瀏覽器頁面載入之後，請注意，目前的識別碼控制項會顯示自訂內控制項。After you load the page in a browser, notice that the ID of the current control is displayed within the custom control.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 取得的導出的值屬性`webPart`。Gets the calculated value of the property for `webPart`. 當開發人員不指派值給屬性控制項，這個方法會產生做為標題顯示的值。When developers do not assign a value to the property of a control, this method produces the value to display as the title. 未命名的控制項的導出的值是由數字為字串，加上數字，指出目前的區域內的控制項的序列所組成。The calculated value for untitled controls consists of a number appended to a string, with the number indicating a control's sequence within the current zone.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 所傳回的值方法是包含控制項、 網頁伺服器位置的相對虛擬路徑加上附加的查詢字串值，並形成匯出要求提交給伺服器。The value returned by the method is a relative virtual path to the server location of the page that contains the control, plus the appended query string value that forms the export request submitted to the server. 方法將字串編碼之前允許的要求來提交，以防範惡意的指令碼攻擊。The method encodes the string before allowing the request to be submitted, to protect against malicious script attacks. > [!NOTE] > 如需有關保護 Web 組件的應用程式的詳細資訊，請參閱[保護的 Web 組件頁面](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/8ada6210-ed00-4157-b3e9-a7e87e77caa2)。For more information about securing Web Parts applications, see [Securing Web Parts Pages](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/8ada6210-ed00-4157-b3e9-a7e87e77caa2).

remarks.format: ## Remarks 一般情況下，有兩種類別的控制項，開發人員將會置於參與 Web 組件的應用程式的區域：控制項，繼承自基底類別和其他伺服器控制項，它可以是標準ASP.NET 控制項、 自訂控制項或使用者控制項。In general, there are two categories of controls that developers place in zones to participate in Web Parts applications: controls, which inherit from the base class, and other server controls, which can be standard ASP.NET controls, custom controls, or user controls. 當任何這些控制項置於花費的功能區域，控制項。When any of these controls is placed in a zone, it takes on the functionality of a control. A控制項本質上具有這項功能，但其他種類的伺服器控制項則否。A control has this functionality inherently, but the other kinds of server controls do not. 若要啟用做為其他伺服器控制項控制它們都放置於區域中，ASP.NET 會將它們包裝與控制項。To enable the other server controls to act as controls when they are placed in a zone, ASP.NET wraps them with a control. 因為控制項直接繼承自類別，它會提供它的子控制項，則為 true 的 Web 組件功能。Because the control inherits directly from the class, it provides its child controls with true Web Parts features. 通常在執行階段，網頁程式開發人員可能想要取得的參考包含其中一個區域中的伺服器控制項的控制項。Often at run time, page developers might want to get a reference to the control that contains one of the server controls in a zone. 方法可讓他們擷取參考控制項。The method enables them to retrieve a reference to the control. ## Examples 下列程式碼範例示範使用方法。The following code example demonstrates the use of the method. 程式碼範例包含控制項內宣告區域。The code example contains a control declared within a zone. `Button1_Click`方法會先列印的 ID控制項標籤，然後再使用方法來擷取參考包裝行事曆的控制項。The `Button1_Click` method first prints the ID of the control to a label, and then uses the method to retrieve a reference to the control that wraps the calendar. 識別碼控制項，以及其子控制項的識別碼 (也就是控制項)，兩者會列印至第二個標籤。The ID of the control, and the ID of its child control (which is the control), are both printed to a second label. [!code-aspx-csharp[WebParts_WebPartManager_GetGenericWebPart#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/WebParts_WebPartManager_GetGenericWebPart/CS/getGenericWebPartCS.aspx#1)] [!code-aspx-vb[WebParts_WebPartManager_GetGenericWebPart#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/WebParts_WebPartManager_GetGenericWebPart/VB/getGenericWebPartVB.aspx#1)]

remarks.format: ## Remarks Web 組件連接一律會牽涉到兩個控制項，其中一個做為資料提供者，另一個做為資料的取用者。A Web Parts connection always involves exactly two controls, one acting as the provider of data, the other acting as the consumer of data. 每個控制項都必須有一或多個定義為連接點的方法。Each control must have one or more methods that are defined as connection points. 如果提供者控制項，其連接點會物件。In the case of a provider control, its connection points are objects. 提供者必須永遠有至少一個連接點，能夠建立連線。A provider must always have at least one connection point to be able to establish a connection. 方法會檢查提供者控制項，並擷取其所有的連接點的集合。The method checks a provider control and retrieves a collection of all its connection points. 擷取提供者連接點是必要的步驟中建立 Web 組件連接。Retrieving the provider connection points is a necessary step in forming a Web Parts connection. ## Examples 下列程式碼範例會示範如何使用 方法。The following code example demonstrates how to use the method. 此範例包含四個部分：The example has four parts: - 使用者控制項，可讓您變更 Web 組件頁面上的顯示模式。A user control that enables you to change display modes on a Web Parts page. - 包含兩個自訂的網頁可以連接的控制項和``項目。A Web page that contains two custom controls that can be connected, and an `` element. - 原始程式碼檔，其中包含兩個自訂控制項和自訂的介面。A source code file that contains two custom controls and a custom interface. - 此範例在瀏覽器中的運作方式的說明。An explanation of how the example works in a browser. 在程式碼範例的第一個部分是變更顯示模式的使用者控制項。The first part of the code example is the user control for changing display modes. 您可以取得使用者控制項的原始程式碼範例區段的類別概觀。You can obtain the source code for the user control from the Example section of the class overview. 如需有關顯示模式，以及使用者控制的運作方式的詳細資訊，請參閱 < [ 逐步解說： 變更 Web 組件頁面上顯示的模式](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/24e42f74-82dc-4c13-8574-130398985fc0)。For more information about display modes and how the user control works, see [Walkthrough: Changing Display Modes on a Web Parts Page](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/24e42f74-82dc-4c13-8574-130398985fc0). Web 網頁的宣告式標記包含`Register`使用者控制項和自訂控制項的指示詞。The declarative markup for the Web page contains `Register` directives for both the user control and the custom controls. 沒有``項目，``項目以包含自訂控制項，並有``項目。There is an `` element, an `` element to contain the custom controls, and an `` element. 請注意，在`Page_Load`方法，將程式碼是否連線已經存在，而且，如果沒有，請定義提供者、 取用者，以及其各自的連接點，會檢查，然後將新的連線新增至所參考的靜態連接集合的屬性。Notice that in the `Page_Load` method, the code checks to see whether a connection already exists and, if not, defines a provider, a consumer, and their respective connection points, and then adds a new connection to the set of static connections referenced by the property. 請注意，會使用擷取的物件方法會傳遞至方法，以判斷是否可以建立兩個控制項之間的連線。Note that the object that is retrieved by using the method is then passed to the method to determine whether a connection between the two controls can be created. [!code-aspx-csharp[WebParts_WebPartManager_StaticConnections#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/WebParts_WebPartManager_StaticConnections/CS/wpmgrStaticConnectionCS.aspx#1)] [!code-aspx-vb[WebParts_WebPartManager_StaticConnections#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/WebParts_WebPartManager_StaticConnections/VB/wpmgrStaticConnectionVB.aspx#1)] 此範例的第三個部分是控制項的原始程式碼。The third part of the example is the source code for the controls. 您可以取得此程式碼和指示，編譯的範例區段類別概觀。You can obtain this code, and instructions for compiling it, from the Example section of the class overview. 您已載入網頁瀏覽器中之後，請按一下**顯示模式**下拉式清單控制項，然後選取**Connect**切換頁面，即可連接模式。After you have loaded the Web page in a browser, click the **Display Mode** drop-down list control and select **Connect** to switch the page to connect mode. 連接模式使用``項目，可讓您建立控制項之間的連線。Connect mode uses the `` element to enable you to create connections between controls. 在連線模式中，按一下標題列中的向下箭號**郵遞區號**控制項來啟用它的動詞命令功能表中，然後按一下**Connect**。In connect mode, click the downward arrow in the title bar of the **ZIP Code** control to activate its verbs menu, and then click **Connect**. 連接使用者介面 (UI) 會出現之後，請注意，連線已經存在的程式碼中包含`Page_Load`方法。After the connection user interface (UI) appears, notice that a connection has already been created by the code contained in the `Page_Load` method. 如果您在稍後的瀏覽器工作階段中返回此頁面，此靜態連接就會將已建立，且不需要重新建立每次頁面載入。If you return to this page in a later browser session, this static connection will already be established and will not need to be recreated each time the page loads.

Public Overridable Function ImportWebPart (reader As XmlReader, ByRef errorMessage As String) As WebPart
public: virtual System::Web::UI::WebControls::WebParts::WebPart ^ ImportWebPart(System::Xml::XmlReader ^ reader, [Runtime::InteropServices::Out] System::String ^ % errorMessage);

summary.span: Imports an XML description file that contains state and property data for a control, and applies the data to the control.

span.span: Imports an XML description file that contains state and property data for a control, and applies the data to the control.

returns.span: A (or a server control that is wrapped by a and thus treated as a ) that is referenced in the imported XML description file.

span.span: A (or a server control that is wrapped by a and thus treated as a ) that is referenced in the imported XML description file.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 方法會匯入所建立的 XML 描述檔伺服器控制項的方法。The method imports an XML description file that was created by the method for a server control. 它不是匯入之後，實際的伺服器控制項，但只包含有關控制項的狀態和屬性資料的說明檔案。It is not the actual server control that is imported, but only the description file containing state and property data about the control. 控制項和 description 檔案中參考的組件必須已經是使用者嘗試匯入描述檔案的伺服器上可用的。The control and assembly referenced in the description file must already be available on the server where a user attempts to import the description file. 若要啟用匯入控制項，開發人員必須新增匯入將會啟用的頁面上的控制項。To enable importing a control, a developer needs to add a control on the page where import will be enabled. 在區域中，內必須加入控制項。Within the zone, an control must be added. 這個控制項提供的檔案 對話方塊中，可讓使用者瀏覽並找出要匯入描述檔案。This control provides a file dialog box that allows users to browse and locate the description file to import. 使用者尋找描述檔案，並開始匯入之後，會讀取描述檔案方法。After a user finds a description file and begins the import, the description file is read by the method. 如果沒有任何錯誤，而且如果找不到組件和控制，要將伺服器控制項加入至目錄內控制和 description 檔案中指定的各種屬性和狀態資料套用至控制項。If there are no errors and if the assembly and control are found, the server control is added to the catalog within the control, and the various property and state data specified in the description file are applied to the control. 然後使用者可以選取控制項，並將它新增至頁面。The user can then select the control and add it to the page. > [!IMPORTANT] > 像是方法，方法有一些可能的安全性風險。Like the method, the method has some potential for security risks. 這牽涉到將資料匯入網站，因為惡意使用者可能嘗試插入描述檔案匯入的資料不正確或甚至是指令碼。Because it involves importing data into a Web site, a malicious user could try to insert bad data or even script code into the description file that is imported. 然後在頁面上，或在資料庫中，可能會出現不正確的資料，或插入的指令碼無法執行。Then the bad data could appear on a page, or in a database, or the inserted script could run. 如需匯入描述檔案，以及避免這些風險的方式相關聯的潛在風險的概觀，請參閱 < [ 保護的 Web 組件頁面](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/8ada6210-ed00-4157-b3e9-a7e87e77caa2)。For an overview of the potential risks associated with importing description files, and ways of avoiding those risks, see [Securing Web Parts Pages](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/8ada6210-ed00-4157-b3e9-a7e87e77caa2).

remarks.format: ## Remarks 屬性會公開的 Api 呼叫的一組大部分用於擴充性案例的方法。The property exposes the APIs to call into a set of methods that are used mostly in extensibility cases. 使用這些內部方法的設計的方式是透過存取屬性。The designed way to use these internal methods is to access them through the property. 因為屬性已受到保護，您可以只存取它，並呼叫的方法，執行個體內藉由繼承自類別類別。Because the property is protected, you can only access it and call the methods within an instance of the class by inheriting from the class. > [!NOTE] > 這個屬性中的 IntelliSense 會隱藏[!INCLUDE[vsprvsext](~/includes/vsprvsext-md.md)]。This property is hidden from IntelliSense in [!INCLUDE[vsprvsext](~/includes/vsprvsext-md.md)]. 不過，在 衍生類別，您仍然可以存取的屬性和其各種成員。However, in a derived class, you can still access the property and its various members.

summary.span: Determines whether a or other server control can be added to a page.

span.span: Determines whether a or other server control can be added to a page.

remarks.format: ## Remarks Web 組件功能的一部分是彈性的能夠在執行階段時，將伺服器控制項加入至網頁。Part of the flexibility of the Web Parts feature is the ability to add server controls to Web pages at run time. 有一些常見的案例所在之伺服器控制項 (它可以是自訂控制項、 自訂伺服器控制項、 使用者控制項或 ASP.NET 控制項) 可以加入。There are a number of common scenarios in which a server control (which can be a custom control, a custom server control, a user control, or an ASP.NET control) can be added. 在下列常見的情況下，Web 組件控制集嘗試將伺服器控制項加入至頁面，而呼叫方法來授權它們：In the following common scenarios, the Web Parts control set attempts to add server controls to a page, and the method is called to authorize them: - 藉由宣告內的 Web 網頁標記中新增的伺服器控制項時區域。When a server control is added by declaring it in the markup of a Web page within a zone. - 當伺服器控制項是以程式設計方式新增至區域。When a server control is added programmatically to a zone. - 當使用者匯入的伺服器控制項的 Web 組件類別目錄的控制項。When a user imports a server control into a Web Parts catalog of controls. - 當現有的伺服器控制項載入個人化資料存放區。When an existing server control is loaded from the personalization data store. - 若要新增的伺服器控制項時以供目錄中的伺服器控制項的控制項。When a server control is added to a control to make it available in a catalog of server controls. 在其中加入控制項，每個案例呼叫方法來確定是否要加入的控制項，以便符合所有授權的準則。In each scenario where controls are added, the method is called to ensure that all authorization criteria have been met to allow a control to be added. 當控制項已獲得授權時，它會新增通常因為它可以有沒有任何篩選的案例。When a control is authorized, it is added normally as it would be if there was no filtering scenario. 當控制項未獲授權時，Web 組件控制集可以回應有好幾種，視內容而定。When a control is not authorized, the Web Parts control set can respond in several ways, depending on the context. 將未經授權的組件 （如果不需要通知使用者） 無法以無訊息方式到控制項組，它可以顯示錯誤訊息，或它可以加入的執行個體類別做為預留位置。The control set can silently fail to add an unauthorized part (if there is no need to inform the user), it can display an error message, or it can add an instance of the class as a placeholder. 這個預留位置物件不會顯示在頁面上，但會顯示在頁面原始碼，以表示未經授權的控制項已排除。This placeholder object is not visible on the page, but is visible in the page source code to indicate that an unauthorized control was excluded. 控制項是否獲得授權的行列式是授權篩選條件。The determinant of whether a control is authorized is the authorization filter. 授權篩選條件是可讓開發人員從頁面排除不符合指定的準則的任何控制項的 Web 組件控制項集合中的功能。An authorization filter is a feature in the Web Parts control set that enables developers to exclude from a page any controls that do not meet the specified criteria. 若要建立篩選的案例，開發人員必須做兩件事。To create a filtering scenario, developers must do two things. 首先，他們必須指派字串值 （值可以是任意），即可每個屬性學生打算在此案例中使用的控制項。First, they must assign a string value (the value can be arbitrary) to the property of each control they plan to use in the scenario. 它們也可以指派值給這個屬性對於其他類型的不是伺服器控制項控制項，因為如果它們被放在區域，以包裝此類控制項控制項在執行階段，以及此控制項繼承屬性。They can also assign a value to this property for other types of server controls that are not controls, because if they are placed in zones, such controls are wrapped with a control at run time, and this control inherits the property. 第二個的必要步驟來建立篩選的案例是為覆寫方法，或建立的事件處理常式事件。The second necessary step for creating a filtering scenario is to either override the method, or to create an event handler for the event. 在這些方法，開發人員可以檢查屬性，以及如果此值會指出不應該授權控制項，開發人員確保方法會傳回值`false`。In these methods, a developer can check the property, and if the value indicates that the control should not be authorized, the developer ensures that the method returns a value of `false`. > [!NOTE] > 如需程式碼範例和如何設定自訂的篩選案例中使用的描述方法，請參閱方法的多載的主題。For code examples and a description of how to set up a customized filtering scenario using the method, see the topics for the overloads of the method.

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig instance bool IsAuthorized(class System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart webPart) cil managed

param.name: webPart
param.span: A or other server control being checked for authorization.

span.span: A or other server control being checked for authorization.

summary.span: Carries out the initial steps in determining whether a control is authorized to be added to a page.

span.span: Carries out the initial steps in determining whether a control is authorized to be added to a page.

returns.span: A Boolean value that indicates whether can be added to a page.

span.span: A Boolean value that indicates whether can be added to a page.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 方法會呼叫設定為檢查授權的 Web 組件控制項的初始方法控制項。The method is the initial method called by the Web Parts control set to check authorization for a control. 它接受`webPart`做為參數，並開始處理程序，最後會決定是否將控制項加入至頁面。It accepts `webPart` as a parameter, and begins a process that ultimately determines whether the control will be added to a page. 直接呼叫這個方法從程式碼時您必須判斷是否授權指定的控制項。Call this method from your code directly when you need to determine whether a given control is authorized. 這個方法會執行初始工作，判斷控制項是否繼承自類別，或者是控制項，且如果是的話，控制哪些類型的子項目包含。This method carries out the initial tasks of determining whether the control inherits from the class or is a control and, if so, what type of child control it contains. 若要完成授權工作，它會呼叫方法多載。To finish the task of authorization, it calls the overload method. ## Examples 下列程式碼範例示範如何呼叫從您的程式碼，以判斷控制項是否獲得授權加入至頁面的方法。The following code example demonstrates how to call the method from your code to determine whether a control is authorized to be added to a page. 在程式碼範例有三個部分：The code example has three parts: - 自訂會覆寫的控制項方法。A custom control that overrides the method. - 建立的篩選器的網頁控制項。A Web page that creates a filter for a control. - 如何執行此程式碼範例的說明。An explanation of how to run the code example. 此程式碼範例會使用自訂控制項，會覆寫多載方法，以提供的自訂處理屬性。This code example uses a custom control that overrides the overload method to provide custom handling of the property. 這個控制項的屬性值會檢查`admin`而且，如果值存在時，會授與該控制項。This control checks for a property value of `admin` and, if the value is present, authorizes the control. 如果控制項有不同的值，它未獲授權;不使用屬性值的控制項授權的因為它們都假設為無法篩選案例的一部分。If a control has a different value, it is not authorized; controls without the property value are authorized as well, as they are presumed not to be part of the filtering scenario. 若要執行此程式碼範例，您必須編譯這個原始程式碼。For this code example to run, you must compile this source code. 您可以明確編譯它，然後將產生的組件放在您的網站的 Bin 資料夾或全域組件快取。You can compile it explicitly and put the resulting assembly in your Web site's Bin folder or the global assembly cache. 或者，您可以將原始程式碼放在您網站的 App_Code 資料夾中，這樣就會在執行階段進行動態編譯。Alternatively, you can put the source code in your site's App_Code folder, where it will be dynamically compiled at run time. 此程式碼範例會使用動態編譯的方法。This code example uses the dynamic compile method. 如需示範如何編譯的逐步解說，請參閱 < [ 逐步解說： 開發和使用自訂 Web 伺服器控制項](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/6d90782a-a1a4-45a6-b2d4-cf6362b83b08)。For a walkthrough that demonstrates how to compile, see [Walkthrough: Developing and Using a Custom Web Server Control](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/6d90782a-a1a4-45a6-b2d4-cf6362b83b08). [!code-csharp[WebParts_WebPartManager_IsAuthorized#2](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/WebParts_WebPartManager_IsAuthorized/CS/MyManagerAuthorize.cs#2)] [!code-vb[WebParts_WebPartManager_IsAuthorized#2](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/WebParts_WebPartManager_IsAuthorized/VB/MyManagerAuthorize.vb#2)] 程式碼範例的第二個部分會建立可能可以排除控制項的篩選條件。The second part of the code example creates a filter that can potentially exclude a control. 以下網頁包含三個中的 ASP.NET 伺服器控制項``項目。The following Web page contains three ASP.NET server controls in an `` element. 請注意，第一個和第二個控制項都有其屬性設定為不同的值，以及第三個未指派的屬性。Notice that the first and second controls have their properties set to different values, and the third does not assign the property. 在執行階段，可以檢查此授權值和控制項可以加入至頁面上，如果篩選條件符合時，開發人員所設定的準則。This authorization value can be checked at run time, and the control can be added to the page if the filter matches criteria set by the developer. 另外請注意，在`Page_Load`方法中，程式碼會呼叫方法，以判斷是否每個控制項已獲得授權，以及如果因此，它會設定每個控制項屬性。Notice also that in the `Page_Load` method, the code calls the method to determine whether each of the controls is authorized, and if so, it sets each control's property. [!code-aspx-csharp[WebParts_WebPartManager_IsAuthorized#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/WebParts_WebPartManager_IsAuthorized/CS/IsAuthorizedCS.aspx#1)] [!code-aspx-vb[WebParts_WebPartManager_IsAuthorized#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/WebParts_WebPartManager_IsAuthorized/VB/IsAuthorizedVB.aspx#1)] 請注意，程式碼範例正常運作，您必須新增設定以啟用匯出 Web 組件描述檔案的 Web.config 檔案中。Note that for the code example to work, you must add a setting in the Web.config file to enable exporting Web Parts description files. 請確定您有與網頁相同的目錄中的 Web.config 檔案，此程式碼範例。Ensure that you have a Web.config file in the same directory as the Web page for this code example. 內``區段中，請務必``項目`enableExport`屬性設為`true`，如下列標記。Within the `` section, make sure there is a `` element with an `enableExport` attribute set to `true`, as in the following markup. `` `...` `` 在瀏覽器頁面載入之後，請注意，會顯示第一個控制項，因為它會比對的準則中覆寫的方法。After you load the page in a browser, note that the first control is displayed, because it matches the criteria in the overridden method. 第二個控制項不會加入到頁面上，因為它會排除篩選器。The second control is not added to the page, because it is excluded by the filter. 也加入第三個控制項，因為它並沒有其屬性集。The third control is also added, because it does not have its property set. 請注意，如果您按一下其中一個控制項的標題列中動詞命令功能表圖示時，他們可以同時匯出，因為其各自沒有指派屬性值。Notice that if you click the verbs menu icon in the title bar of either control, they can both be exported because their respective property values were assigned.
